GK16andhvc2u:5: avivakṣita-vācyasya dhvaner vācyaṃ dvidhā matam // DhvK_2.1 //
GK16andhvc2u:8: locanam dvitīya uddyotaḥ yā smaryamāṇā śreyāṃsi sūte dhvaṃsayate rujaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:16: tatra dviprakāraprakāśane vṛttikārakṛte yannimittaṃ bījabhūtamiti bālapriyā dvitīya uddyotaḥ locanasyottarasyāto na vyākhyā prapyate 'tra
GK16andhvc2u:21: janaiḥ smaryamāṇā satī, teṣāṃ śreyāṃsi sūte janayati /
GK16andhvc2u:25: yadvā-abhīṣṭāni phalāni yasyāṃ sā udārā mahatī ca kalpavallī tāmiti rūpakam /
GK16andhvc2u:55: tatra prathamoddyote vṛttikāreṇa prakāśitaḥ avivakṣitavācyasya yaḥ prabhedo 'vāntaraprakārastatpratipādanāyedamucyate
GK16andhvc2u:56: tadavāntarabhedapratipādanadvāreṇaiva cānuvādadvāreṇāvivakṣitavācyasya yaḥ prabhedo vivakṣitānyaparavācyātprabhinnatvaṃ tatpratipādanāyedamucyate /
GK16andhvc2u:59: saṅkramitamiti ṇicā vyañcanāvyāpāre yaḥ sahakārivargastasyāyaṃ prabhāva ityuktaṃ tiraskṛtaśabdena ca /
GK16andhvc2u:60: yena vācyenāvivakṣitena satāvivakṣitāvācyo dhvanirvyapadiśyate tadvācyaṃ dvidheti sambandhaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:64: bālapriyā "iti pratamodyota" ityuktatvādatra pakṣe tatreti tatpadena tasya parāmarśa ityāhṛ--
GK16andhvc2u:68: atra pakṣe ata iti śeṣo bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:111: dharmāntarasaṃvalanayā vācyadharmātiriktadharmaprakārakapratītiviṣayatvena hetunā anyatāṃ gata iva lakṣyamāṇaḥ pratīyamānaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:112: anugatadharmī san lakṣyamāṇadharmāṇāṃ tatra tatra bhinnatve 'pi vyaktirūpo dharmī anustūta eveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:117: snigdhaśyāmalakāntiliptaviyato velladbalākā dhanā vātāḥ śīkariṇaḥ payodasuhṛdāmānandakekāḥ kalāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:118: locanam yastvanupapadyamāna upāyatāmātreṇārthāntarapratipattiṃ kṛtāv palāyata iva sa tiraskṛta iti /
GK16andhvc2u:119: nanu vyaṅgyātmano yadā dhvanerbhedo nirūpyate tadā vācyasāya dvidheti bhedakathanaṃ na saṅgatamityāśaṅkyāha--
GK16andhvc2u:123: vyañjake tvarthe yadi dhvaniśabdastadā na kaściddoṣa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:127: snigdhayā jalasambandhasarasayā śyāmalayā draviḍavanitocitāsitavarṇayā kāntyā cākacakyena liptamācchuritaṃ viyannabho yaiḥ vellantyo vijṛmbhamāṇāstatā calantyaḥ parabhāgavaśātpraharṣavaśācca balākāḥ bālapriyā rūpāntarapariṇata iti arthāntare saṅkramitamityasyaiva vivaraṇam
GK16andhvc2u:143: viśeṣa ityasyānantaraṃ 'iti vyaṅgyaprakāśanaparasya dhvanerevāyaṃ prakāraḥ' iti pāṭhaḥ kvācitkaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:148: tatrādyapakṣe avivakṣitavācyasyetyasya avivakṣitaḥ apradhānīkṛto vācyassvātmā yena sa iti prathamodyotoktārthau bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:167: kāmaṃ santu dṛḍhaṃ kaṭhorahṛdayo rāmo 'smi sarve sahe vaidehī tu kathaṃ bhaviṣyati hahā hā devi dhīrā bhava //
GK16andhvc2u:168: locanam sitapakṣiviśeṣā yeṣu ta evaṃ nabhastāvaddurālokaṃ vartate /
GK16andhvc2u:170: yataḥ sūkṣmajalakaṇodgāriṇo vātā iti mandamandatvameṣāmaniyatadigāgamanaṃ ca bahuvacanena sūcitam /
GK16andhvc2u:172: payodānāṃ ye suhṛdasteṣu ca satsu ye śobhanahṛdayā mayūrāsteṣāmānandena harṣeṇa kalāḥ ṣaṅjasaṃvādinyo madhurāḥ kekāḥ śabdaviśeṣāḥ tāśca sarvaṃ payodavṛttāntaṃ dussahaṃ smārayanti; svayaṃ ca dussahā iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:173: evamuddīpanavibhāvodbodhitavipralambhaḥ parasparādhiṣṭānatvadrateḥ vibhāvānāṃ sādhāraṇatāmabhimanyamānaḥ ita eva prabhṛti priyatamāṃ hṛdayenidhāyaiva svātmavṛttāntaṃ tāvadāha--
GK16andhvc2u:181: sa bālapriyā śīkarima iti śīkarasambandhapratipādanena hetunetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:189: śobhanahṛdayā iti ata evānanda iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:218: tathāca kaṭhorahṛdayapadantadarthānuguṇānāmeva dharmāṇāṃ rāmaśabdena vyañjene sahaṅkāritayā nirdiṣṭamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:221: anena hi vyaṅgyadharmāntarapariṇataḥ sañjñī pratyāyyate, na saṃjñimātram /
GK16andhvc2u:226: uktaprakāreṇa hṛdayanihitāṃ priyāṃ smaraṇaśabdavikalpaparamparayā pratyakṣībhāvitāṃ hṛdayasphoṭanonmukhīṃ
GK16andhvc2u:236: pratīyamānaṃ tu tadasaṅkhyamanudbhi viseṣatvenaiva kiṃ kiṃ rūpaṃ na sahata iti citrapānakarasāpūpaguḍamodakasthānīyavicitracarvaṇāpadaṃ bhavati /
GK16andhvc2u:248: śabdaḥ vaidehīti śabdaḥ, tajjanitabodha iti yāvat /
GK16andhvc2u:274: anudbhinnaḥ aspaṣṭaḥviśeṣaḥ pārthakyaṃ parasparabheda iti yāvat, yatra tatvenaiva tadviśiṣṭameva
GK16andhvc2u:275: pānakarasādyāsvāde karpūrādyāṃśā yathā pārthakyena nānubhūyante, kintu parasparasaṃvalitatvenaiva prayojanapratītau tathā rājyanirvāsanādayo dharmā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:282: guḍopaskṛtaṃ modakaṃ guḍamodakaṃ tatsthānīyā taccarvaṇākatulyā yā vicitrā vilakṣaṇā carvaṇā rāmagatatvena tattaddharmāvagāhinī pratītiḥ, tasyāḥ padaṃ viṣaya yathā ca mamaiva viṣamabāṇalīlāyām---
GK16andhvc2u:283: tālā jāanti guṇā jālā de sahiaehiṃ gheppānti /
GK16andhvc2u:289: locanam eṣa eva sarvatra prayojanasya pratīyamānatvenotkarṣaheturmantavyaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:290: mātragrahaṇena saṃjñī nātra tiraskṛta ityāha---yathā cetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:297: tena śuddhe 'rthe mukhye bādhānimittaṃ tatrārthe taddharmasamavāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:298: tena nimittena rāmaśabdo dharmāntarapariṇatamarthaṃ bālapriyā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:311: atra rāmapadalakṣyatāvacchedakaṃ rāmapadavācyatvaṃ sāmānyato duḥkhapātratvaṃ vā bodhyam /
GK16andhvc2u:314: tadā guṇāḥ atiśayādhāyako dharmo gumastadvantaḥ santaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:321: raviṃṇā kiraṇānugṛhītānikaraspṛṣṭāni, atha cābhinanditāni kamalāni pajhāni
GK16andhvc2u:326: lakṣmīpātratvādi yaddharmāntaraśataṃ tasya citratā citratāviśiṣṭaṃ taditi yāvat /
GK16andhvc2u:350: anupayogabādhito hyartho 'sya dhvanerviṣayo lakṣaṇā mūlaṃ hyasya /
GK16andhvc2u:351: yattu hṛdayadarpaṇa uktam---'hahā heti saṃrambhārtho 'yaṃ camatkāraḥ' iti
GK16andhvc2u:354: ahaṃ sahe tasyāḥ ki vartata ityevamātmā hi saṃrambhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:355: kamalapade ca kaḥ saṃrambha ityāstāṃ tāvat /
GK16andhvc2u:362: dvitīyaḥ kamalaśabdo lakṣmīpātratvādipariṇatamarthaṃ lakṣyati, vyaṅgyantu manoharatvādītyarthaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:363: jāyante guṇā ityatra guṇaśabdasyāvṛttiḥ, dvītīyo guṇaśabdaḥ utkṛṣṭatvādidharmāntarapariṇatamarthaṃ lakṣyatītyādyāśaṅkāṃ parihartumāha---guṇaśabda ityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:382: na tu lakṣaṇāyā viṣaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:387: hahāhetyanena gabhyo yassaṃrambhaḥ tasyārthaḥ kāryabhūta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:397: ahaṃ sarvaṃ sahe ityarthasyopodbalako hi rāmaśabdābhivyaktārtha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:412: locanam na ca tiraskṛtatvaṃ dharmirūpema, tasyāpi tāvatyanugamāt /
GK16andhvc2u:418: andho 'yaṃ puro 'pi na paśyatītyatra tiraskārondhārthasya na tvatyantam /
GK16andhvc2u:420: andhaśabdo 'tra padārthasphuṭīkaraṇāśaktatvaṃ naṣṭadṛṣṭigataṃ nimattīkṛtyādarśaṃ lakṣaṇayā pratipādayati /
GK16andhvc2u:433: nanu upahatatvaṃ jananātparato yatkiñcitkāraṇena bhavati, tathāca jātyandhe kathamandhavyavahāra ityata āha--jātyandhasyāpīti /
GK16andhvc2u:434: prakṛtodāraṇe andhapadavācyasyātyantatiraskṛtatvaṃ viśadayitumanyatra tadabhāvaṃ darśayati---andha ityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:455: niśvāsāndha iva ya ādarśastadrūpaścandramā iti yojanaṃ cetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:458: ivaśabdasyobhayatra sambandho 'stviti śaṅkāṃ pariharan āha---na ceti /
GK16andhvc2u:462: gaaṇaṃ ca mattamehaṃ dhārāluliajjuṇāiṃ a vaṇāiṃ /
GK16andhvc2u:464: locanam na ca niḥśvāsenāndha ivādarśaḥ sa iva candra iti kalpanā yuktā /
GK16andhvc2u:467: gaganaṃ ca mattameghaṃ dhārālulitārjunāni ca vanāni /
GK16andhvc2u:473: nirahaṅkāramṛgāṅkā nīlā apiniśā na kevalaṃ sitakarakaradhavalitāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:476: nirahaṅkāraśabdenāpi candraṃ lakṣayatā tatpāratantryavicchāyatvojjigamiṣārūpajigīṣātyāgaprabhṛtiḥ avivakṣitavācyasya prabhinnatvamiti yaduktaṃ tatkutaḥ? na hi svarūpādeva
GK16andhvc2u:477: bhedo bhavatītyāṅkya vivaṅkṣitavācyādevāsya bhedo bhavati, vivakṣā
GK16andhvc2u:479: bālapriyā gaganaṃ ceti varṣāvarṇanam. ca śabda iti /
GK16andhvc2u:492: pratiṣedhasya prasaktipūrvakatvānnarahaṅkāraśabdo hyahaṅkārasvarūpayogye cetanaviśeṣe eva svarasataḥ prayujyata ityato 'tra
GK16andhvc2u:499: ujjigamiṣā unnatīcchā, tadrūpā yā jīgīṣā utkarṣecchā tattyāgaprabhṛtirityarthaḥ // 1 //
GK16andhvc2u:515: vivakṣitābhidheyasya dhvaner ātmā dvidhā mataḥ // DhvK_2.2 //
GK16andhvc2u:519: sa ca vācyārthāpekṣayā kaścidalakṣyakramatayā prakāśate, kaścitkrameṇeti dvidhā mataḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:520: locanam samyaṅ na lakṣayituṃ śakyaḥ kramo yasya tādṛśa uddyota uddyotanavyāpāro 'syeti bahuvrīhiḥ
GK16andhvc2u:527: idānīṃ tu dyotanavyāpāramukhena dyotyasya khātmaniṣṭa evetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:528: vyaṅgyasya dhvanerdyetane svātnani kaḥ krama ityāśaṅkyāha----vācyārthāpekṣayeti /
GK16andhvc2u:532: yo rasādirarthaḥ sa evākramo dhvanerātmā na tvakrama eva saḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:538: nanu kiṃ sarvadaiva rasādirartho dhvaneḥ prakāraḥ? netyāha; kiṃ tu yadāṅgitvena pradhānatvenāvabhāsamānaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:539: etacca sāmānyalakṣaṇe 'guṇīkṛtasvārthāvi'tyatra bālapriyā kuto noktamityata āha---dhvaniśabdetyādi
GK16andhvc2u:553: rasetyādikārikāyāmaṅgibhāvena bhāsamāno rasabhāvādiḥ akramo ghnanerātmā vyavasthita ityanvayo vaktavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:555: sa cārtho bādhitaḥ, kvacidbhāvādeḥ saṃlakṣyakramatvasyāpyaṅgīkṛtatvādato vivakṣitamarthaṃ vyācaṣṭe---yo rasādirityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:573: sa ca rasādirdhvanirvyavasthita eva; na hi tacchūnyaṃ kāvyaṃ kiñcidasti /
GK16andhvc2u:574: yadyapi ca rasenaiva sarvaṃ jīvati kāvyam tathāpi tasya rasasyaikadhanacamatkārātmano 'pi kutaścidaṃśātprayojakībhūtādadhiko 'sau
GK16andhvc2u:576: tatra yadā kaścidudriktāvasthāṃ pratipanno vyabhicārī camatkārātiśayaprayojako bhavati, tadā bhāvadhvaniḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:577: yathā---- tiṣṭetkopavaśātprabhāvapihitā dīrghaṃ na sā kupyati svargāyotpatitā bhavenmayi punarbhāvārdramasyā manaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:578: tāṃ hartuṃ vibudhadviṣo 'pi na ca me śaktāḥ purovavartinīṃ sā
GK16andhvc2u:585: yathā-- yote gotraviparyaye śrutipathaṃ śayyāmanuprāptayā nirdhyātaṃ parivartanaṃ punarapi prārabdhumaṅgīkṛtam /
GK16andhvc2u:588: aṅgibhāvena bhāsamāna ityuktāvaṅgabhāvena bhāne kaḥ prakāra iti jijñāsāyāḥ sambhavāditi bhāvaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:620: locanam bhūyastatprakṛtaṃ kṛtaṃ ca śithilakṣiptaikadorlekhayā tanvaṅgyā na tu pāritaḥ stanabharaḥ kraṣṭuṃ priyasyorasaḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:621: atra hi praṇayakopasyojjigamiṣayaiva yadavasthānaṃ na tu pārita ityudayāvakāśanirākaraṇāttadevāsvādajīvitam
GK16andhvc2u:626: atra cerṣyāvipralambhasya rasasyāpi praśama iti śakyaṃ yojayitum /
GK16andhvc2u:628: yathā--- osuru sumṭhi āhaṃ muhu cumbau jeṇa /
GK16andhvc2u:630: ityatra śrutyukte tu kope kopakaṣāyagadgadamandaruditāyā yena mukhaṃ cumbitaṃ tenāmṛtarasanigaraṇaviśrāntiparamparāṇāṃ tṛptirjñāteti kopaprasādasandhiścamatkārasthānam /
GK16andhvc2u:638: śithilakṣiptaikadorlekhayā pūrvaṃ śithilā śitilīkṛtā paścādanyatra kṣiptā ca ekadorlekhā yayā tathā satyā /
GK16andhvc2u:641: jānātīcchati yatate ceṣṭate iti kramo 'tra pradarśitaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:644: 'stanabharaḥ priyasya urasaḥ kraṣṭuṃ na pārita' iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:660: yadvā---amṛtarasasya viśrāntipūrvakāṇi nigaraṇāni viśramya viśramya nigaraṇāni /
GK16andhvc2u:665: yathā--- kvākāryaṃ śaśalakṣmaṇaḥ kva ca kulaṃ bhūyo 'pi dṛśyeta sā doṣāṇāṃ
GK16andhvc2u:666: praśamāya me śrutamaho kope 'pi kāntaṃ mukham /
GK16andhvc2u:667: kiṃ vakṣyantyapakalmaṣāḥ kutadhiyaḥ svapne 'pi sā durlabhā cetaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:668: sāvasthyamupaihi kaḥ khalu yuvā dhanyo 'dharaṃ dhāsyati //
GK16andhvc2u:669: atra hi vitakāraitsukye matismaraṇe śahkādainye dhṛticintane parasparaṃ bādhyabādhakabhāvena dvandvaśo bhavantī, paryante tu cintāyā eva pradhānatāṃ dadatī paramāsvādasthānam /
GK16andhvc2u:672: nanvevaṃ vibhāvānubhāvamukhenāpyadhikaścamatkāro dṛśyata iti vibhāvadvaniranubhāvadhvaniśca vaktavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:674: taccarvaṇāpi cittavṛttiṣveva paryavasyatīti rasabhāvebhyo nādhikaṃ carvāṇīyam /
GK16andhvc2u:675: yadā tu vibhāvānubhāvāvapi vyaṅyau bhavatastadā vastudhvanirapi kiṃ na sahyate /
GK16andhvc2u:762: yadyapi 'śṛṅgārānukṛtiryā tu sa hāsyaḥ' iti muninā nirūpitaṃ
GK16andhvc2u:764: dūrākarṣaṇamohamantra iva me tannāmni yāte śrutiṃ cetaḥ kālakalāmapi prakurute nāvasthitiṃ tāṃ vinā /
GK16andhvc2u:769: aścābhāsatā yenāsya sītā mayyupekṣikā dviṣṭā veti pratipattirhṛdayaṃ na spṛśatyeva /
GK16andhvc2u:772: ata eva tadābhāsatvaṃ vastutastatra sthāpyate śuktau rajatābhāsavat /
GK16andhvc2u:774: tathā ca tatra hāsyo raso vaktuṃ nyāya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:777: taccarvaṇottaramayamananuraktāṃ kāmayata iti rāvaṇāmilāṣādyālamvitasya hāsasya sahṛdayānāmudbodhāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:782: dūrākarṣaṇaṃ mohaśca tatkārī yo mantraḥ tasminnavetyupamā /
GK16andhvc2u:786: ākulitasya vihvalīkṛtasya vikṣatā naṣṭā ratiḥ viṣayāntareṣu ruciryasya tasya /
GK16andhvc2u:795: atra pratīyamānā ratirabhilāṣarūpā cittavṛttireva, na tu sthāyibhāva iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:822: śṛṅgārānukṛtiryā tu sa hāsya iti prayuñjāna ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:825: ata evābhilāṣe ekataraniṣṭe 'pi śṛṅgaraśabdena tatra tatra
GK16andhvc2u:828: evaṃ rasadhvanerevāmī bhāvadhvaniprabhṛtayo niṣyandā āsvāde pradhānaṃprayojakamevamaṃśaṃ vibhajya pṛthagvyavasthapyate /
GK16andhvc2u:831: rasadhvanistu sa eva yo 'tra mukhyatayā vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyojanoditasthāyi pratipattikasya pratipattuḥ sthāyyaṃśacarvaṇāprayukta evāsvādaprakarṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:832: yathā--- kṛcchreṇoruyugaṃ vyatītya suciraṃ bhrāntvā nitambasthale madhye
GK16andhvc2u:834: maddṛṣṭistṛṣiteva samprati śanerāruhya tuṅgo stanau sākāṅkṣaṃ muhurīkṣate jalalavaprasyandinī locane //
GK16andhvc2u:835: atra hi nāyikākārānuvarṇyamānasvātmapratikṛtipavitritacitraphalakāvalokanādvatsarājasya bālapriyā iti hyoko 'rtha iti /
GK16andhvc2u:842: kathaṃ tarhi pṛthagvyavahāra ityata āha---āsvāda iti /
GK16andhvc2u:849: ekāsvādaḥ yaḥ sammūrcchitasya vyāptasya āmodasya upabhogaḥ tasminnapi /
GK16andhvc2u:853: vibhāvādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanena taccarvaṇāyā uditā utpannā sthāyipratipattiḥ yasya /
GK16andhvc2u:857: trivalyeva taraṅgaḥ taraṅgatulyā trivalī vā tena viṣame nimnonnate /
GK16andhvc2u:862: atroruyugasya nitambasya cātiviśālatvaṃ madhyasya tanutvaṃ stanayormahatvaṃ ca gamyata iti saundaryātiśayo jalalavetyādinā nāyikāyā virahaduḥkhātiśayasca vyajyate /
GK16andhvc2u:865: nāyikākāreṇa likhitanāyikāpratikṛtyā hetunā anuvarṇyamānaṃ narmasacivaṃ pratimaharvarṇyabhānaṃ svātmapratikṛtyā likhitanāyakapratikṛtyā pavitritaṃ
GK16andhvc2u:866: ca, yadvā--nāyikākāreṇa rasādirartho hi saheva vācyenāvabhāsate /
GK16andhvc2u:868: idānīṃ rasavadalaṅkārādalakṣyakramadyotanātmano dhvanervibhakto viṣaya iti pradarśyate---
GK16andhvc2u:870: rasādi-paratā yatra sa dhvaner viṣayo mataḥ // DhvK_2.4 //
GK16andhvc2u:873: locanam parasparāsthābandharūpo ratisthāyibhāvo vibhāvānubhāvasaṃyojanavaśena carvaṇārūḍha iti /
GK16andhvc2u:884: anayā ca bhaṅgyā rasavadādiṣvalaṅkāreṣu rasādidhvanernāntarbhāva iti sūcayati /
GK16andhvc2u:885: pūrvaṃ hi samāsoktyādiṣu vastudhvanernāntarbhāva iti darśitam /
GK16andhvc2u:886: vācyaṃ ca vācakaṃ ca taccārutvahetavaśceti dvandvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:890: nanūktaṃ bhaṭṭanāyakena---"raso yadā paragatatayā pratīyate tarhi tāṭasthyameva syāt /
GK16andhvc2u:891: na ca bālapriyā kartrā anuvarṇyamānā dṛśyamānā, 'nirvarṇyamāne'ti pāṭhaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:892: sādhiṣṭhaḥ, yā svātmapratikṛtistayā pavitritaṃ yaccitraphalakaṃ tadavalokanādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:896: vācyetyādikārikāyāṃ 'śabdālaṅkārā' ityādivṛttau cārthāntarabhramaḥ syādityato vivakṣitamarthaṃ vyācaṣṭe---vācyatrcetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:907: tāṭasthye sati svarasanīyatvaṃ na bhavediti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:909: 'asau svagatatvena na ca pratīyata' iti sambandhaḥ tatpratyāyakābhāvāditi
GK16andhvc2u:919: alokasāmānyānāṃ ca rāmādīnāṃ ye samudrasetubandhādayo vibhāvāṃste kathaṃ sādhāraṇyaṃ bhajeyuḥ
GK16andhvc2u:924: pratipattuḥ svacittavṛttereva pratyakṣarūpā pratītirbhavati, tathā ca taccittavṛtterutpattirāvasyakī
GK16andhvc2u:926: nanu rasa utpadyatāmityatrāha-sā cetyādi. sā ca svātmani rasotpatiśca /
GK16andhvc2u:934: vāsanāyāḥ sahṛdayagataratyādivāsanāyāḥ yo vikākaudbodhaḥ tasya heturyo vibhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:938: tathā ca sītāyāḥ mānuṣītvena sītādau sahṛdayānāṃ kāntātvasaṃvedanaṃ bhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:942: devatāsvamātrādernāyikātvena varṇanasthale devatādāvāradhyatvajñānena pratibandhāttatra kāmyatvarūpakāntātvasaṃvedanaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:943: nanu kāvyāditaḥ sītādijñāne jāte sahṛdayānāṃ svakāntāsmaraṇaṃ jāyate, tena ca tadvāsanodvodha ityata āha---na cetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:950: samudrasetubandhanānau utsāhahetuḥ svakṛtisādhyatvabuddhirhṛdayasaṃvādo vā sahṛdayānāṃ notpadyeteti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:959: utpattipakṣe ca karuṇasyotpādādduḥkhitve karuṇaprekṣāsu punarapravṛttiḥ syāt /
GK16andhvc2u:961: viṣayārjanatāratamyapravṛttiḥ syāt tatrāpi kiṃ khagato 'bhivyajyate rasaḥ paragato veti pūrvavadeva doṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:962: tena na pratīyate notpadyate nābhivyajyate kāvyena rasaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:964: tatrābhidāyakatvaṃ vācyaviṣayam, bhāvakatvaṃ rasādiviṣayam, bhogakṛtvaṃ sahṛdayaviṣayamiti trayoṃ'śabhūtā vyāpārāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:965: tatrābhidhābhāgo yadi śuddhaḥ syāttattantrādibhyaḥ śāstranyāyebhyaḥ śleṣādyalaṅkāraṇāṃ ko bhedaḥ? vṛttibhedavaicitryaṃ cākiñcitkaram /
GK16andhvc2u:966: śrutiduṣṭādivarjanaṃ ca kimartham? bālapriyā pratipattāviveti sambandhaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:976: nanu ratyādirūpo rasaḥ sūkṣmarūpema sahṛdayānāmātmani vartata ityataḥ siddha evetyatrāha---śaktītyādi
GK16andhvc2u:982: viṣayo ratyādiviṣayaḥ kāntādiḥ abhivyaktyupāya iti yāvat /
GK16andhvc2u:983: tasya arjane sampādane tāratamyapravṛttiḥ taratamabhāvena pravṛttiḥ syāditi /
GK16andhvc2u:984: yathā andhakārasthaghaṭāderadhikādhikābhivyaktaye tadupāyabhūtālokasyādhikādhikasyārjane janānāṃ pravṛttistathā vāsanātmatayā antaḥ sthitasya ratyāderadhikādhikābhivyaktaye tadupāyabhūtasya vibhāvāderadhikādhikasyānubhavarūpārjane sahṛdayānāṃ pravṛttiḥ prasajyetetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:995: trayoṃ'sā yasya tasya bhāvastattā, tasyāḥ prasādātsambandhādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:997: vācyeti. vācyo 'rtho viṣayo yasya tat, vācyārthasambandhītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1007: śāstrai locanam tena rasabhāvanākhyo divatīyo vyāpāraḥ; yadvaśadabhidhā vilakṣaṇaiva /
GK16andhvc2u:1008: taccaitadbhāvakatvaṃ nāma rasān prati yatkāvyasya tadvibhāvādīnāṃ sādhāraṇatvāpādanaṃ nāma
GK16andhvc2u:1009: bhāvite ca rase tasya bhogaḥ yo 'nubhavasmaraṇapratipattibhyo vilakṣaṇa eva drutivistaravikāsātmā
GK16andhvc2u:1011: sa eva ca pradhānabhūtoṃ'śaḥ siddharūpa iti /
GK16andhvc2u:1016: vṛttibhedāḥ upanāgarikādyāḥ teṣāṃ vaicitryaṃ ca akiñcitkaramiti /
GK16andhvc2u:1030: rasān prati etadbhāvakatvaṃ nāma taditi sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1044: tathāca bhāvanopanīto rāmādigataratyādiḥ sthāyī sahṛdayairbhujyamāno rasaḥ ratyādeḥ sādhāraṇyena pratītyā ca na tāṭasthyādidoṣa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1047: anubhavasmaraṇarūpāḥ yāḥ pratīpattayo laukikyaḥ pratītayastābhya ityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:1053: nijacitsvabhāvā svātmacaitanyarūpā ca yā nivṛtiḥ lokottarānandaḥ, tasyāṃ viśrāntiḥ vigalitavedyāntaratayā sthitiḥ tallakṣaṇa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1054: atra rajaso guṇasyānuvedhena drutiḥ tamaso vistāraḥ satvasya vikāsa iti vivekaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1055: uktaṃ hi kāvyaprakāśasaṅkete---"yadāhi rajaso guṇasya drutiḥ tamaso vistāraḥ satvasya vikāsaḥ tadā bhogaḥ svarūpaṃ lamata" iti /
GK16andhvc2u:1062: pratipattṝṇāṃ locanam atrocyate---rasasvarūpa eva tāvadvipratipattayaḥ prativādinām /
GK16andhvc2u:1063: tathāhi-pūrvāvasthāyāṃ yaḥ sthāyī sa eva vyabhicārisampātādinā prāptaparipoṣo 'nukāryagata eva rasaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1065: pravāhadharmiṇyāṃ cittavṛttau cittavṛtteḥ cittavṛttyantareṇa kaḥ paripoṣārthaḥ? vismayaśokakrodhādeśca krameṇa tāvanna paripoṣa iti nānukārye rasaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1076: udyānādibhirvyabhicāribhiḥ paripoṣito rāmādāvanukārye rasaḥ, naṭe tu rāmādirūpatānusandhānavaśādāropyamāṇassāmājikānāṃ camatkārakārīti bhaṭṭalollaṭādimatamādau darśayati---pūrvetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:1087: nāṭyasya nāṭyasambandhī vā raso nāṭyarasa iti vyutpattiriti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1088: matamidaṃ dūṣayitvā prakārāntareṇa vadatāṃ śrīśaṅkukādīnāṃ mataṃ
GK16andhvc2u:1091: pravāhadharmiṇyāṃ tattatkāraṇavaśena punaḥ punarutpadyamānāyāṃ naśyantyāṃ ca satyāmiti hetugarbham
GK16andhvc2u:1100: yathoktaṃ kāvyaprakāśasaṅkete---"iṣṭaviyogajo mahān śokaḥ kramema śāmyati,
GK16andhvc2u:1101: na tu dṛḍhībhavati krodhotsāharatayaśca nijanijakāraṇodbhūtā api kālavasādamarṣasthairyasavāviparyaye 'pacīyanta" iti /
GK16andhvc2u:1104: anukāryarāmādigato rasa ityuktapakṣo na yukta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1109: layo nāma nṛttagītavādyānāmekatānatārūpaṃ sāmyaṃ rasasya naṭe siddhatvena tadupayogilayādyanusaraṇaṃ na syādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1113: kastarhi? ihānantyānniyatasyānukāro na śakyaḥ, niṣprayojanaśca viśiṣṭatāpratītau tāṭasthyena vyutpattyabhāvāt /
GK16andhvc2u:1114: tasmādaniyatāvasthātmakaṃ sthāyinamuddiśya vibhāvānubhāvyabhicāribhiḥ saṃyujyamānairayaṃ rāmaḥ sukhīti smṛtivilakṣaṇā sthāyini pratītigocaratayāsvādarūpā pratipattiranu kartrālambanā nāṭyaikagāminī rasaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1116: kiṃ tvanukāryābhinnābhimate nartake āsvādayitā sāmājika ityetāvanmātramadaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1117: tena nāṭya eva bālapriyā tadbhāve ityanuṣajyate /
GK16andhvc2u:1119: rāmāderiva sāmājikasyāpi ratyādirūparasotpattau camatkāro na jāyeteti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1137: sthāyino rāmādivyaktiviśeṣavṛttitvavaiśiṣṭyamavabudhya naṭena tadanukāre kriyamāṇe tathaiva sāmājikānāṃ pratītyā tasya taṭasthatvena caturvargopāyavyutpatteranudayādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1138: anena sthāyyanukāro rasa iti pakṣo 'pyayukta iti darśitam /
GK16andhvc2u:1166: tathāvidhapratītirūparasasya nartakaviśeṣyakatvānnartake viśeṣyatāsambandhena satvātsa evāśraya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1172: pratītyā rasyamāno rasa iti nāṭyādrasā nāṭyarasāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1173: apare punarvibhāvānubhāvamātrameva viśiṣṭasāmagapyā samarpyamāṇaṃ tadvibhāvanīyānubhāvanīyasthāyirūpacittavṛttyucitavāsanānuṣaktaṃ svanirvṛticarvaṇāviśiṣṭameva rasaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1175: anye tu śuddhaṃ vibhāvam, apare śuddhamanu bhāvam, kecittu sthāyimātram,
GK16andhvc2u:1176: itare vyabhicāriṇam, anye tatsaṃyogam, eke 'nukāryam, kecana sakalameva samudāyaṃ rasamāhurityalaṃ bahunā /
GK16andhvc2u:1178: astu vātra nāṭyādvicitrarūpā rasapratītiḥ; upāyavailakṣaṇyādiyameva tāvadatra saraṇiḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1179: evaṃ sthite prathamapakṣa bālapriyā nāṭye iti chedaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1182: sāmājikānāṃ jāyate, sa eva camatkārakārī rasa iti kecittanmatamāha----anya
GK16andhvc2u:1199: tābhyāṃ vibhavānubhavābhyāṃ kramādvibhāvaniyā anubhāvanīyā ca yā ratyādisthāyirūpacittavṛtyucitā vāsanā sāmājikagatā tadanuṣaktaṃ tatsambaddham /
GK16andhvc2u:1201: svasya sāmājikasya nirvṛtirūpā yā carvaṇā tadviśiṣṭaṃ tadviṣayabhūtam /
GK16andhvc2u:1204: 'śuddhaṃ vibhāvam' ityādau sarvatra rasamāhurityasya sambandho bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1214: alaukiko laukikaśabdavyatiriktaḥ prasanno madhura ojasvī ca yaḥ śabdaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:1228: kiṃ tu yathā pratītimātratvenāviśiṣṭatve 'pi prātyakṣikī ānumānikī āgamotthā pratibhānakṛtā yogipratyakṣajā ca
GK16andhvc2u:1231: rasāḥ pratīyanta iti odanaṃ pacatītivadyvavahāraḥ pratīyamāna eva hi rasaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:1233: sā ca nāṭye laukikānumānapratītervilakṣaṇā; tāṃ ca pramukhe upāyatayā sandadhānā /
GK16andhvc2u:1234: evaṃ kāvye anyaśābdapratītervilakṣaṇā, tāṃ ca pramukhe upāyatayāpekṣamāṇā
GK16andhvc2u:1236: rāmādicaritaṃ tu na sarvasya hṛdayasaṃvādīti mahatsāhasam /
GK16andhvc2u:1249: piśāco hi viśiṣyājñātatvenātrāyaṃ viśāca ityādi lokavyavahārānarhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1263: pakvastaṇḍulo hyodanapadārtha iti tadvayavahāro yathā aupacārikaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:1296: kimetadapūrvam? kāvyaṃ ca rasān prati bhāvakamiti yaducyate, bālapriyā ityuktamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1299: tathāca lokottaracariteṣvapi sahṛdayānāṃ hṛdayasaṃvādo bhavatyeveti bhāvaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:1304: bhojarājena sūtradvayamidamitthaṃ vivṛtam--iha nānāyoniṣu bhramatāṃ saṃsāriṇāṃ kāñcidyonimanubhūya yadā yonyantarasahasravyavadhānena punastāmeva yoniṃ pratipadyate, tadā tasyāṃ pūrvānubhūtāyāṃ yonau tathāvidhaśarīrādivyañjakāpekṣayā yā vāsanāḥ prakaṭībhūtā āsaṃstāstathāvidhavyañjakābhāvāttirohitāḥ punastathāvidhavyañjakaśarīrādilābhe prakaṭībhavanti /
GK16andhvc2u:1308: sa ca svarganarakādīnāṃ phalānāmaṅkurībhāvaḥ, karmaṇāṃ vā yāgādīnāṃ
GK16andhvc2u:1309: śaktirūpatayāvasthānaṃ, karturvā tathāvidhabhogyabhoktṛtvarūpaṃ sāmarthyaṃ, saṃskārātsmṛtiḥ smṛteśca sukhaduḥkhopabhogaḥ, tadanubhavācca punarapi saṃskārasmṛtyādayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1310: bhavatvānantaryaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvaśca vāsanānāṃ; yadā tu prathamamevānubhavaḥ pravartate, tadā kiṃ vāsanānimitta uta nirnimitta iti
GK16andhvc2u:1312: nityatvāt' seyamāśīrmahāmoharūpā sadaiva sukhasādhanāni me bhūyāsurmā kadācana tairme viyogo 'bhūditi yaḥ saṅkalpaviśeṣo vāsanānāṃ kāraṇaṃ tasyāḥ nityatvādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1313: etaduktaṃ bhavati---kāraṇasya sannihitatvādanubavasaṃskārādīnāṃ kāryaṇāṃ pravṛttiḥ kena vāryata iti /
GK16andhvc2u:1324: bhāvakatvamiti yaduktaṃ tadapyasmadamyupagatameva, parantu guṇālaṅkāraśālitvameva tat; yatastenaiva kāvyaṃ sahṛdayānāṃ rasabhāvakaṃ
GK16andhvc2u:1331: kiñca bhāvakatvasvīkāre raso notpadyata iti bhavadīyapratijñāyā bhaṅge
GK16andhvc2u:1336: locanam tatra bhavataiva bhāvanādutpattipakṣa eva pratyujjīvitaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1337: na ca kāvyaśabdānāṃ kevalānāṃ bhāvakatvam, arthāparijñāne tadabhāvāt. na ca kevalānāmarthānām, śabdāntareṇārpyamāmatve tadayogāt /
GK16andhvc2u:1340: tasmādvayañjakatvākhyena vyāpārema guṇālaṅkāraucityādikayetikartavyatayā kāvyaṃ bhāvakaṃ rasān bhāvayati, iti tryaṃsāyāmapi bhāvanāyāṃ karaṇāṃśe dhvananavyāpāra eva mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1341: tacacedaṃ bhogakṛttvaṃ rasasya dhvananītyatve siddhe daivasiddham /
GK16andhvc2u:1358: sādhanākāṅkṣāyāṃ dhātvartho yāgādiḥ karaṇatvena, itikartavyatākāṅkṣāyāṃ prayājādikriyākalāpaśca itikartavyatātvena tasyāṃ bhāvanāyamanvetīti mīmāṃsakāḥ prāhuḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1359: tathā ca yajetetyādivaidikavākyaṃ svargamudṛsya puruṣaṃ prati vidhāyakatvena yathā bhāvakaṃ yāgena karaṇena prayājādītikartavyatayā svargārthinaḥ svargaṃbhāvayati, tathā kāvyaṃ bhāvakaṃ vyañjakatvavyāpāreṇa karaṇena guṇālaṅkāraucityādirūpayā itikartavyatayā sagṛdayasya rasaṃ
GK16andhvc2u:1362: kartavyatayāḥ prakāra iti kartavyatā, upakārakamiti yāvaditi bodhyam /
GK16andhvc2u:1372: kriyata evetyarthaḥ. nana kriyata iti vā pāṭhaṃ(?) viśeṣamāha--api
GK16andhvc2u:1374: 'api tu bhoge kartavye lokottaro dhvananavyāpāra eva mūrdhābhiṣikta' iti samābandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1376: dhanaṃ nibiḍaṃ yanmeharūpamāndhyamajñānaṃ tena yā saṅkaṭatā ānandāṃśasyāvṛtatvaṃ tasyā nivṛtitirbhañjanaṃ taddvāreṇetyathaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1381: rasabhāvatadābhāsatatpraśamalakṣaṇaṃ mukhyamarthamanuvartamānā yatra śabdārthālaṅkārā guṇāśca parasparaṃ dhvanyapekṣayā vibhinnarūpā vyavasthitāstatra kāvye dhvaniriti vyapadeśaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1386: yathā rāmastathāhamityupamānātiriktāṃ rasāsvādopāyasvapratibhāvijṛmbhārūpāṃ vyutpattimante karotīti kamupālabhāmahe /
GK16andhvc2u:1387: tasmātsthitametat---abhiviyajyante rasāḥ pratītyaiva ca rasyanta iti /
GK16andhvc2u:1397: rasyamānatayā hetunā udito yaścamatkāraḥ camatkāratmakaḥ sākṣātkāraḥ tadanatiriktatvāttabhinnatvādityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:1416: iti yadupamānamityākārikā yā upamitiḥ sādṛśyadhīḥ śāstretihāsābhyāṃ kriyamāṇā tadatiriktāmityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:1419: rasāsvādopāyabhūtā svasya pratipattuḥ yā pratibhā tasyā vijṛmbho vikāsastadrūpāmityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:1422: punaḥ punaḥ kāvyapariśīlane hi rasāsvādopāyasvapratibhāvikāso bhavati /
GK16andhvc2u:1423: ante karotītyanenādāvuktopamitirūpāṃ vyutpattiṃ ci karotīti jñāpyate /
GK16andhvc2u:1435: kāvye tasminn alaṅkāro rasādir iti me matiḥ // DhvK_2.5 //
GK16andhvc2u:1438: yadyapi rasavadalaṅkārasyānyairdarśito viṣayastathāpi yasmin kāveya pradhānatayānyo 'rtho vākyārthībhūtastasya cāṅgabhūtā ye rasādayaste rasāderalaṅkārasya viṣayā iti māmakīnaḥ pakṣaḥ tadyathā cāṭuṣu preyolaṅkārasya vākyārthatve 'pi rasādayo 'ṅgabhūtā
GK16andhvc2u:1442: me matirityanyapakṣaṃ dūpyatvena hṛdi nidhāyābhīṣṭatatvātsvapakṣaṃ pūrvaṃ
GK16andhvc2u:1444: sa hi paradarśito viṣayo bhāvinītyānopapanna iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1445: yasmin kāvye iti spaṣṭatvenāsaṅgataṃ vākyamitthaṃ yojanīyam--yasmin kāvye te pūrvoktā rasādayo 'ṅgabhūtā vākyārthībhūtaścānyo 'rthaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:1446: caśabdastuśabdasyārthe; tasya kāvyasya sambandhino ye rasādayo 'ṅgabhūtāste rasāderalaṅkārasya rasavadādyalaṅkāraśabdasya viṣayāḥ; sa evālaṅkāraśabdavācyo bhavati yo 'ṅgabhūtaḥ, na tvanya iti yāvat /
GK16andhvc2u:1466: tasya cāṅgabhūtā ityatra tatpadena kāvyasyaiva parāmṛśyatayā yathāśrute tadarthasya tannirūpitāṅgatvasya
GK16andhvc2u:1468: te rasādayo 'ṅgabhūtā ityasya pūrvavākye 'pi sambandha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1476: tathāca tasyeti ṣaṣṭhyantārthasya kāvyasambandhitvasya rasādāvanvayānnāsaṅgatārthakatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1482: cāṭuṣvityādi dṛśyanta ityantamekaṃ vākyamiti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1485: gurvādiviṣayikā yā prītirbhaktivātsalyādipadavācyā, tasyāḥ svavācakena vibhāvādidvāreṇa vā varṇanamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1486: locanam tatra preyānalaṅkāro yatra sa preyolaṅkāro 'laṅkaraṇīya ihoktaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1490: udbhaṭamatānusāriṇastu bhaṅktvā vyācakṣate---cāṭuṣu cāṭuviṣaye vākyarthatve cāṭūnāṃ vākyārthatve preyolaṅkārasyāpi viṣaya iti pūrvoṇa sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1491: udbhaṭamate hi bhāvālaṅkāra eva preya ityuktaḥ, premṇā bhāvānāmupalakṣaṇāt /
GK16andhvc2u:1493: rasavacchabdena preyaḥśabdena ca sarva eva rasavadādyalaṅkārā upalakṣitāḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:1494: tadevāha---rasādayo 'ṅgabhūtā dṛśyanta iti uktaviṣaya iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1497: adya yā mama govinda jātā tvayi gṛhāgate //
GK16andhvc2u:1501: cāṭusthale 'kiṃ hāsyene'tyādau varṇyamānanarapatiprabhāvādereva vākyārthatā na tu preyorūpālaṅkārasyetyataḥ tatpadaṃ bahuvrīhitvāśrayeṇa
GK16andhvc2u:1508: aho narapateḥ prabhāvo yenaivaṃ durdaśā ripustrijano 'nubhavatīti
GK16andhvc2u:1530: anubhāvādītyādiśabdena vibhāvavyabhicārisvaśabdānāṃ ca grahaṇamatra bhāvanāmalaṅkārateti ca tadvyākhyātā pratīhārendurājaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1534: sa ca rasādiralaṅkāraḥ śuddhaḥ saṅkīrṇī vā /
GK16andhvc2u:1535: tatrādyo yathā--- kiṃ hāsyena na me prayāsyasi punaḥ prāptaścirādṛrśanaṃ keyaṃ niṣkaruma pravāsarucitā kenāsi dūrīkṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1536: svapnānteṣviti te vadan priyatamavyāsaktakaṇṭhagraho buddhvā roditi riktabāhuvalayastāraṃ ripustrījanaḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:1540: rasāntareṇāṅgabhūtenālaṅkārāntarema vā na miśraḥ, ābhiśrastu saṅkīrṇaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1548: svapnānteṣu svapnāyiteṣu suptapralatiteṣu punaḥpunarudbhūtatayā bahuṣviti vadanyuṣmākaṃ sambandhī ripustrījanaḥ bālapriyā prayeśśabdeneti /
GK16andhvc2u:1556: gurbādiviṣayakaprītivarṇanameva preyolaṅkāraḥ, cāṭusthale tasyaprādhānye 'pi rasādayastatprītestadviṣayanarapatiprabhāvādervā aṅgabhūtāśceti bhāmahamatānurodhena paṅktyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1558: cāṭusthale 'kiṃ hāsyene'tyādau cāṭurvākyārthaḥ, tatra rasavadalaṅkāraḥ bhāvālaṅkāraśca sta ityudabhaṭamatānurodhena paṅktyartha iti sārārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1580: locanam priyatame viśeṣemāsaktaḥ kaṇṭhagraho yena tādṛśa eva san buddhvā śūnyavalayākārīkṛtabāhupāśaḥ san tāraṃ muktakaṇṭhaṃ roditīti /
GK16andhvc2u:1581: atra śokasthāyibhāvena svapnadarśanoddīpitena karuṇarasena carvyamāṇena sundarībhūto narapatiprabhāvo bhātīti karuṇaḥ śuddha evālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1582: na hi tvayā ripavo hatā iti yādṛganalaṅkṛto 'yaṃ vākyārthastādṛgayam, api tu sundaratarībhūto 'tra vākyārthaḥ, saundaryaṃ ca karuṇarasakṛtameveti /
GK16andhvc2u:1583: candrādinā vastunā tathā vastvantaraṃ vadanādyalaṅkriyate tadupamitatvena cārutayāvabhāsāt
GK16andhvc2u:1584: tathā rasenāpi vastu vā rasāntaraṃ vopaskṛtaṃ sundaraṃ bhāti iti rasasyāpi vastuna ivālaṅkāratve ko virodhaḥ? nanu rasena kiṃ kurvatā prakṛto 'rtho
GK16andhvc2u:1588: rasenāpi tarhi sarasīkriyate so 'rtha iti svasaṃvedyametat /
GK16andhvc2u:1589: tena yatkecidacūcudan--'atra rasena vibhāvādīnāṃ madhye kimalaṅkriyate'
GK16andhvc2u:1591: asyārthasya bhūyasā lakṣye bālapriyā bahuṣviti bahuvacanārthavivaraṇam /
GK16andhvc2u:1627: saṅkīrṇo rasādiraṅgabhūto yathā---- kṣipto hastāvalagnaḥ prasabhamabhihato
GK16andhvc2u:1634: avadhūta iti na pratīpsitaḥ bālapriyā kṣipta ityādyamarukastham /
GK16andhvc2u:1636: āliṅganyo 'vadhūtastripurayuvatibhiḥ sāśrunetrotpalābhiḥ kāmīvārdrāparādhaḥ sa dahatu duritaṃ śāmbhavo vaḥ śarāgniḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:1637: ityatra tripuraripuprabhāvātiśayasya vākyārthatver irṣyāvipralambhasya śloṣasahitasyāṅgabhāva iti, evaṃvidha eva rasavadādyalaṅkārasya nyāyyo viṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1638: ata eva cerṣyāvipralambhakaruṇayoraṅgatvena vyavasthānātsamāveśo na doṣaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:1643: yadyapyatra karuṇo raso vāstavo 'pyasti tathāpi sataccārutvapratītyai na
GK16andhvc2u:1644: vyāpriyata ityanenābhiprāyeṇa śleṣasahitasyetyetāvadevā vocat na tu karumasahitasyetyapi /
GK16andhvc2u:1647: yato 'tra vipralambhasyālaṅkāratvaṃ na tu vākyārthatā, ato hetorityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1649: yadi hyanyatarasya rasasya prādhānyamabhaviṣyanna dvitīyo rasaḥ samāviśet
GK16andhvc2u:1650: ratisthāyibhāvatvena tu sāpekṣabhāvo vipralambhaḥ, sa ca śokasthāyibhāvatvena nirapekṣabhāvasya karuṇasya viruddha eva /
GK16andhvc2u:1651: evamalaṅkāraśabdaprasaṅgena samāveśaṃ prasādhya bālapriyā 'śarāgniḥ vaḥ duritaṃ dahatvi'ti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1652: sa kaḥ? ya ārdraḥ tatkalabhavaḥ aparādho yasya saḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1687: tatra sarvāsāmalaṅkṛtīnāmityasya yatra hi rasasya vākyārthībhāvastatra
GK16andhvc2u:1688: kathamalaṅkāratvam? alaṅkāro hi cārutvahetuḥ prasiddhaḥ; na tvasāvātmaivātmanaścārutvahetuḥ
GK16andhvc2u:1691: locanam evaṃvidha eveti yaduktaṃ tatraivakārasyābhiprāyaṃ vyācaṣṭe---yatra
GK16andhvc2u:1694: athaṃ bhāvaḥ---upamādīnāmalaṅkāratve yādṛśī vārtā tādṛśyeva rasādīnām /
GK16andhvc2u:1696: tacca yadyapi vastumātramapi bhavati, tathāpi tasya punarapi
GK16andhvc2u:1701: etaduktaṃ bhavati--upamayā yadyapi vācyo 'rtho 'laṅkriyate, tathāpi tasya tadevālaṅkaraṇaṃ yadvyaṅgyārthābhivyañjanasāmarthyadhānamiti vastuto
GK16andhvc2u:1725: varṇyamānāstattadvācyārthā upamādyalaṅkārairāhitātiśayāḥ kavivannabaddhānyataragatacittavṛttiviśeṣaṃ sphuṭaṃ vyañjayanti kvacidarthāntarañceti vyaṅgyābhivyañjanasāmarthyādhānaṃ vācyārthasyopamādikartṛkamalaṅkaraṇamityarthaḥ dhvaniyātmeti /
GK16andhvc2u:1730: tattadātmagatā rāgitvādayo ye cittavṛttiviśeṣāḥ, teṣāṃ yadaucityaṃ tatsūcanātmatayā tatsūcanasvabhāvakatayā tattadalaṅkārā hyasyethaṃ cittavṛttiruciteti sūcayanti; yathā yuvajanaśarīragatā hārakaṭakakuṇḍalādayaḥ tadrāgitvasyaucityaṃ yattiśarīragatā
GK16andhvc2u:1733: tasmādyatra rasādayo vākyārthībhūtāḥ sa sarvaḥ na rasāderalaṅkārasya
GK16andhvc2u:1735: yatra tu prādhānyenārthāntarasya vākyārthībhāve rasādibhiścārutvaniṣpattiḥ kriyate, sa rasāderalaṅkāratāyā viṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1736: evaṃ dhvanerupamādīnāṃ rasavadalaṅkārasya ca vibhaktaviṣayatā bhavati /
GK16andhvc2u:1737: yadi tu cetanānāṃ vākyārthībhāvo rasādyalaṅkārasya viṣaya ityucyate locanam śavaśarīraṃ kuṇḍalādyupetamapi na bhāti, alaṅkāryasyābhāvāt /
GK16andhvc2u:1739: na hi dehasya kiñcidanaucityamiti vastuta ātmaivālaṅkāryaḥ, ahamalaṅkṛta ityabhimānāt /
GK16andhvc2u:1740: rasāderalaṅkāratāyā iti vyadhikaraṇaṣaṣṭhyau, rasāderyālaṅkāratā tasyāḥ sa
GK16andhvc2u:1747: yatra rasasyālaṅkāryatā rasāntaraṃ cāṅgabhūtaṃ nāsti tatra śuddhā evopamādayaḥ tena saṃsṛṣṭyā nopamādīnāṃ viṣayāpahāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1755: yaterātmanaśca rāgitvamanucitamityato yatiśarīragatāḥ kaṭakādayo hāsyāvahā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1756: tattaccetanaśarīragataiḥ kaṭakakuṇḍalādibhiḥ sūcyasya rāgitvādicittavṛttiviśeṣasya tattaccetanocitatve teṣāmalaṅkāratā, anyathā hāsyāvahateti /
GK16andhvc2u:1760: na tu samānādhikaraṇe tatpade iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1762: rasādiniṣṭhā yā alaṅkāratā alaṅkriyākartṛtvaṃ rasādikartṛkālaṅkriyeti yāvat /
GK16andhvc2u:1763: sa eva tasyā viṣaya iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1764: sa iti vṛttisthasyānuvādaḥ, yatretyasya pratinirdeśaḥ tatkāvyamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1767: sa sarvo na rasāderalaṅkārasya viṣaya iti vākya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1775: bhāvasyāparāṅgatve bhāvālaṅkāraḥ, sa eva preyasvī preyāniti cocyate /
GK16andhvc2u:1777: locanam tatra bhāvālaṅktārasya śuddhasyodāharaṇaṃ yathā--- tava śatapatrapatramṛdutāmratalaścaramaścalakalahaṃsanūpurakaladhvaninā mukharaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1778: mahiṣamahāsurasya śirasi prasabhaṃ nihitaḥ kanakamahāmahīdhragurutāṃ kathamamba gataḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:1781: rasābhāsasyālaṅkāratā yathā mamaiva stotre--- samastaguṇasampadaḥ samamalaṅkriyāṇāṃ gaṇair-- bhavanti yadi bhūṣaṇaṃ tava tathāpi no śobhase
GK16andhvc2u:1782: śivaṃ hṛdayavallabhaṃ yadi yathā tathā rañjayeḥ tadeva nanu vāṇi te bhavati sarvalalokottaram
GK16andhvc2u:1783: atra hi parameśastutimātraṃ vācaḥ paramopādeyamiti vākyārthe śṛṅgārābhāsaścārutvahetuḥ śloṣasahitaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:1784: na hyayaṃ pūrṇaḥ śṛṅgāro nāyikāyā nirguṇatve niralaṅkāratve ca bhavati /
GK16andhvc2u:1791: śatapatraṃ pajhaṃ, tasya patramiva mṛṭu tāmraṃ ca talamadhobhāgo yasya saḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1792: calakalahaṃsatulyo nūpuraḥ tasya dhvaninā mukharaḥ sa śabdaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1795: kanakamayo mahāṃśca yo mahīdhraḥ parvataḥ sumeruḥ tasya /
GK16andhvc2u:1804: durghaṭaṃ, tathāpi mṛdutāmratala ityetāvanmātroktāvapi vitarkādeḥ sambhavādupamāyāstadaṅgatvābhāvāttadasaṅkīrṇatvarūpaṃ śuddhatvaṃ sughaṭam
GK16andhvc2u:1807: nanu vāṇi ! samastānāṃ guṇānāṃ mādhuryādīnāmatha ca saundaryādīnāṃ sampadaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1810: tava bhūṣaṇaṃ bhavanti yadi yadyapi, tathāpi tvaṃ no śobhase /
GK16andhvc2u:1821: nāyikāyā nirguṇatve niralaṅkāratve ca sati śṛṅgāraḥ pūrṇo na bhavati, ato
GK16andhvc2u:1824: atha satyāmapi tasyāṃ yatrācetanānāṃ vākyārthībhāvo nāsau rasavadalaṅkārasya viṣaya ityucyate
GK16andhvc2u:1825: tat mahataḥ kāvyaprabandhasya rasanidhānabhūtasya nīrasatvamabhihitaṃ syāt
GK16andhvc2u:1827: bhāvābhāsāṅgatā yathā--- sa pātu vo yasya hatāvaśeṣāstattulyavarṇāñjanarañjiteṣu /
GK16andhvc2u:1832: parasya cāyamāśayaḥ---acetanānāṃ cittavṛttirūparasādyasambhavāttadvarṇane rasavadalaṅkārasyānāśaṅkyatvāttadvibhakta evopamādīnāṃ viṣaya iti /
GK16andhvc2u:1840: yatra hi rasastatrāvaśyaṃ rasavadalaṅkāra iti paramatam /
GK16andhvc2u:1841: tato na rasavadalaṅkāraścennūnaṃ tatra raso nāstīti paramatābhiprāyānnīrasatvamuktam /
GK16andhvc2u:1852: tatrrāsasya bhagavatprabhāvavibhāvitāyāṃ ratau guṇībhāvādbhāvābhāsa ūrjasvyalaṅkāra ityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:1870: nīrasatvamabhihitaṃ syāditi na svamatānurodhena, kintu parabhatānurodhenetyāha locane---yatra hītyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:1876: mata iti taraṅgabhrūbhaṅgā kṣubhitavihagaśreṇiraśanā vikarṣantī phenaṃ vasanamiva saṃrambhaśithilam
GK16andhvc2u:1877: yathāviddhaṃ yāti skhalitamabhisandhāya bahuśo nadīrūpeṇeyaṃ dhruvamasahanā sā pariṇatā //
GK16andhvc2u:1881: taraṅgā eva bhrūbhaṅgā yasyāḥ vikarṣantāṃ vilambamānaṃ balādākṣipantī /
GK16andhvc2u:1885: atha ca madviyogapaścāttāpā sahiṣṇustāpaśāntaye nadībhāvaṃ gateti /
GK16andhvc2u:1898: iyaṃ na nadī, kintu sā iti sambhāvayāmītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1911: evaṃ kṣubhitavihāgaśreṇireva raśanā yasyā iti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc2u:1922: ata eva pādapatitaṃ māmavadhūya tiraskṛtya sthitā /
GK16andhvc2u:1928: meghajālairārdrāḥ pallavā yasyāṃ tasya bhāvaḥ tattā, tayā hetunā aśrubhiḥ
GK16andhvc2u:1933: cintā maunamivāśritā madhukṛtāṃ śabdairvinā lakṣyate caṇḍī māmavadhūya pādapatitaṃ jātānutāpeva sa //
GK16andhvc2u:1934: yathā vā---- teṣāṃ gopavadhūvilāsasuhṛdāṃ rādhārahaḥsākṣiṇāṃ kṣemaṃ bhadra kalindaśailatanayātīre latāveśmanām /
GK16andhvc2u:1937: locanam upāyacintanārthaṃ mauvaṃ, kimiti pādapatitamapi dayitamavadhūtavatyahamiti ca cintayā maunam /
GK16andhvc2u:1939: etau ślokau nadīlatāvarṇanaparau tātparyeṇa purūravasa unmādākrāntasyoktirūpau /
GK16andhvc2u:1941: he bhadra ! teṣamiti ye mamaiva hṛdaye sthitāsteṣām /
GK16andhvc2u:1945: sākṣāddraṣṭāraḥ, kalindaśailatanayā yamunā tasyāstīre latāgṛhāṇāṃ kṣemaṃ kuśalamiti kākvā praśnaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1946: evaṃ taṃ pṛṣṭvā gopadarśanaprabuddhasaṃskāra ālambanoddīpanavibhāvasmaramātprabuddharatibhāvamātmagatamautsukyagarbhaṃmāha dvārakāgato bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ---smaratalpasya madanaśayyāyāḥ kalpanārthaṃ mṛdu sukumāraṃ kṛtvā yaśchedastroṭanaṃ sa evopayogaḥ sāphalyam /
GK16andhvc2u:1947: atha ca smaratalpe yatkalpanaṃ klṝptiḥ sa eva mṛduḥ sukumāra utkṛṣṭaśchedopayogastroṭanaphalaṃ tasminvicchinne /
GK16andhvc2u:1958: gopeti gopadarśanena prabuddhā udbuddhāḥ saṃskārāḥ latāveśmādyanubhavajanitāḥ saṃskārā yasya saḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1975: svasya gopīnāṃ ca yaḥ ityevamādau viṣaye 'cetanānāṃ vākyārthībhāve 'pi
GK16andhvc2u:1978: tadevaṃ satyupamādayo nirviṣayāḥ praviralaviṣayā vā syuḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1981: mayi tu sannihite 'navaratakathitopayogānneme jarājīrṇatākhilīkāraṃ kadācidavāpnuvantīti bhāvaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:1987: nanu yatra cetanavṛttasya sarvathā nānupraveśaḥ sa upamāderviṣayo
GK16andhvc2u:1994: tanniścayābhāve vakṣyamāṇamanupaṃpannaṃ bhavet gopīnāṃ puruṣāntararamaṇe tadupayogasambhavāditi
GK16andhvc2u:1999: anavarato yaḥ kathitopayogaḥ pūrvoktopayogaḥ tasya yogāt /
GK16andhvc2u:2031: yaḥ punaraṅgī raso bhāvo vā sarvākāramalaṅkāryaḥ sa dhvanerātmeti /
GK16andhvc2u:2033: tam artham avalambante ye 'ṅginaṃ te guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2034: aṅgāśritās tv alaṅkārā mantavyāḥ kaṭakādivat // DhvK_2.6 //
GK16andhvc2u:2037: yetamarthaṃ rasādilakṣaṇamaṅginaṃ santamavalambante te gumāḥ śauryādivat /
GK16andhvc2u:2039: locanam kāvye 'nākhyeya eva syāt; śāstretihāsayorapi vā /
GK16andhvc2u:2041: yataḥ parokto viṣayavibhāgo na yukta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2053: kevalaṃ prathamābhiprāye prathamaṃ kārikārdhaṃ dṛṣṭāntābhiprāyeṇa vyākhyeyam /
GK16andhvc2u:2058: na hi tadasti vastu yanna kiñjiccittavṛttiviśeṣamudbodhayatīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2086: śṛṅgāra eva madhuraḥ paraḥ prahlādano rasaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2087: tan-mayaṃ kāvyam āśritya mādhuryaṃ pratitiṣṭhati // DhvK_2.7 //
GK16andhvc2u:2088: śṛṅgāra eva madhuraḥ paraḥ prahlādano rasaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2090: locanam nanuśabdārthayormādhuryādayo guṇāḥ, tatkathamuktaṃ rasādikamaṅginaṃ guṇā āśritā ityāśaṅkyāha--tatā cetyadi /
GK16andhvc2u:2094: ratau hi samastadevatiryaṅnarādijātiṣvavicchinnaiva vāsanāsta iti na kaścittatra tādṛgyo na hṛdayasaṃvādamayaḥ, yaterapi hi taccamatkāro
GK16andhvc2u:2097: madhuro hi śarkarādiraso vivekino 'vivekināṃ v svasthasyāturasya vā
GK16andhvc2u:2100: sa śṛṅgāra ātmatvena prakṛto yatra vyaṅgyatayā /
GK16andhvc2u:2127: kārikāyāṃ madhura ityādinā ayamartho 'pi dṛṣṭāntavidhayā vivakṣita iti
GK16andhvc2u:2136: locanam etaduktaṃ bhavati--vastuto mādhuryaṃ nāma śṛṅgārāde rasasyaiva guṇaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2147: mādhuryam ārdratāṃ yāti yatas tatrādhikaṃ manaḥ // DhvK_2.8 //
GK16andhvc2u:2150: locanam vyañjakayoḥ śabdārthayorupacaritaṃ madhuraśṛṅgārarasābhivyaktisamarthatā śabdārthayormādhuryamiti hi lakṣaṇam
GK16andhvc2u:2157: 'yo yaḥ śastraṃ' ityatra hi śravyatvamasamastatvaṃ cāstyeveti bhāvaḥ // 7
GK16andhvc2u:2158: sambhoga śṛṅgārānmadurataro vipralambhaḥ, tato 'pi madhuratamaḥ karuma iti
GK16andhvc2u:2165: sahṛdayasya cetaḥ svābhāvikamanāviṣṭatvātmakaṃ kāṭhinyaṃ krodhādidoptarūpatvaṃ bālapriyā śṛṅgāreti
GK16andhvc2u:2190: tatpadena madhuratarasya madhuratamasya ca rasasya parāmarśaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2206: raudrādayo hi rasāḥ parāṃ dīptimujjavalatāṃ janayantīti lakṣaṇayā ta locanam vismayahāsādirāgitvaṃ ca tyajatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2208: krameṇetyāśayaḥ tena karuṇe 'pi sarvathaiva cittaṃ dravatītyuktaṃ bhavati
GK16andhvc2u:2209: nanu karuṇe 'pi yadi madhurimāsti, tarhi pūrvakārikāyāṃ śṛṅgāra
GK16andhvc2u:2212: nānena rasāntaraṃ vyavacchidyate; api tvātmabhūtasya rasasyaiva
GK16andhvc2u:2213: paramārthato guṇā mādhuryādayaḥ, upacāreṇa tu śabdārthayorityevakāreṇa
GK16andhvc2u:2224: tathā cārdratā nā cittasya śṛṅgārādicarvaṇājanyaḥ kāṭhinyādiparityāgaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:2242: 'krodhādidīptarūpatvaṃ vismayahāsādī'ti pūrvagranthe krodhādītyādipadena vismayasya grāhyatvātpunarvismayetyuktirasaṅgatā syādato 'tra
GK16andhvc2u:2245: 'pyevami"tyatra ca bībhatsapadasthāne adbhatapadaṃ ca paṭhanīyaṃ, tathā sati kāvyaprakāśādisaṃvādo 'pi bhavati /
GK16andhvc2u:2246: tatra śānte mādhuryamātrakathanaṃ matāntarābhiprāyeṇa yojyamiti pratibhāti
GK16andhvc2u:2248: vikāsarūpo yo vistāraḥ tadrūpaṃ yatprajvalanaṃ tatsvabhāva tatsvarūpā dīptirnāma tathāvidhā eva dīptirityucyate /
GK16andhvc2u:2250: locanam tadāsvādamayā raudrādyāḥ, tayā dīptyā āsvādaviśeṣātmikayā
GK16andhvc2u:2253: tato lakṣitalakṣaṇayā tatprakāśanaparaḥ śabdo dīrghasamāsaracanavākyarūpo 'pi dīptirityucyate
GK16andhvc2u:2279: tatprakāśanaparaḥ śabda ityasyaiva viviraṇaṃ dīrghetyādīti sphuṭīkartumāha--dīrgheti /
GK16andhvc2u:2287: cañcadbhyāṃ vegādāvartamānābhyāṃ bhujābhyāṃ bhramitā yeyaṃ caṇḍā dāruṇā gadā tayā yo 'bhitaḥ sarvata ūrvorghātastena samyak cūrṇitaṃ punaranutthānopahataṃ kṛtamūruyugalaṃ yugapadevorudvayaṃ yasya taṃ
GK16andhvc2u:2288: suyodhanamanādṛtyaiva styānenāśyānatayā na tu kālāntaraśuṣkatayāvabaddhaṃ hastābhyāmavigaladrūpamatyantamābhyantaratayā ghanaṃ na tu rasamātrasvabhāvaṃ yaccheṇitaṃ rudhiraṃ tena śoṇau lohitau pāṇī yasya saḥ
GK16andhvc2u:2291: yasyāstattadapamānajātaṃ kṛtaṃ devyanucitamapi tasyāstava kacānuttaṃsayiṣyatyuttaṃsavataḥ kariṣyati, veṇītvamapaharan karavicyutaśoṇitaśakalairlohitakusumāpīḍeneva yojayiṣyatītyutprekṣā devītyanena kulakalatrakhilīkārasmaramakāriṇā krodhasyaivoddīpanavibhāvatvaṃ kṛtamiti nātra śṛṅgāraśaṅkā kartavyā /
GK16andhvc2u:2329: yathā---- yo yaḥ śastraṃ bibhirti svabhujagurumadaḥ pāṇḍavīnāṃ camunāṃ yo yaḥ pāñcālagotre śiśuradhikavayā garbhaśayyāṃ gato vā /
GK16andhvc2u:2330: yo yastatkarmasākṣī carati mayi raṇe yaśca yaśca pratīpaḥ krodhāndhastasya tasya svayamapi jagatāmantakasyāntako 'ham //
GK16andhvc2u:2332: locanam tāvatyeva madhye viśrāntimalabhamānā cūrṇitorudvayasuyodhanānādaraṇaparyantā pratītirektvenaiva
GK16andhvc2u:2334: anye tusuyodhanasya sambandhi yatstyānā vabaddhaṃ ghanaṃ śoṇitaṃ tena śoṇapāṇiriti vyācakṣte
GK16andhvc2u:2337: pāñcālarājaputrema dhṛṣṭadyumnena droṇasya vyāpādanāttatkulaṃ pratyadhikaḥ krodhāveśo 'śvatthāmnaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:2339: rame saṅkagrāme yaḥ pratīpaṃ pratikūlaṃ kṛtvāste sa evaṃ vidho yadi sakalajagadantako bhavati tasyāpyahamantakaḥ kimutānyasya manuṣyasya devasya bālapriyā drutaṃ sasaṃhitamuccaritatvenāvicchinnavegaśālitvādityarthaḥ tāvatyeveti /
GK16andhvc2u:2347: ekaghana iva bhātīti ca pāṭhaḥ auddhatyasyeti /
GK16andhvc2u:2350: kecittu suyodhanasyeti śeṣe ṣaṣṭhī, śoṇitamityanenāsya sambandha ityāhuḥ
GK16andhvc2u:2358: samarpakatvaṃ kāvyasya yat tu sarva-rasān prati /
GK16andhvc2u:2359: sa prasādo guṇo jñeyaḥ sarva-sādhāraṇa-kriyaḥ // DhvK_2.10 //
GK16andhvc2u:2363: atra pṛthagbhūtaireva kramādvimṛśyamānairarthaiḥ padātpadaṃ krodhaḥ parāṃ dhārāmāśrita ityasamastataiva dīptinibandhanam /
GK16andhvc2u:2364: evaṃ mādhuryadīptī parasparapratidvandvitayā sthite śṛṅgārādiraudrādigate iti pradarśayatā tatsamāveśavaicitryaṃ hāsyabhayānakabībhatsaśānteṣu darśitam /
GK16andhvc2u:2365: hāsyasya śṛṅgārāṅgatayā mādhuryaṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ vikāsadharmatayā caujo 'pi
GK16andhvc2u:2370: śānte tu vibhāvavaicitryātkadācidojaḥ prakṛṣṭaṃ kadācinmādhuryamiti vibhāgaḥ //9//
GK16andhvc2u:2371: samarpaktvaṃ samyagarpaktvaṃ hṛdayasaṃvādena pratipattṝn prati svātmāveśena vyāpārakatvaṃ jhaṭiti śuṣkakāṣṭhāgnidṛṣṭāntena /
GK16andhvc2u:2372: akaluṣodakadṛṣṭantena ca tadakāluṣyaṃ prasannatvaṃ bālapriyā iti yojanā /
GK16andhvc2u:2405: samarpakatvaṃ tu yat pratipattṛhṛdaye sarvarasakarmakaṃ jhaṭiti yadarpaṇaṃ vyāpanarūpaṃ tatkartṛtvaṃ tu yaditi yāvat /
GK16andhvc2u:2406: saḥ sarvasādhāraṇī kriyā vartanarūpā yasya saḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2417: yathā śuṣkakāṣṭhamagriḥ, yathā vā akaluṣaṃ svacchaṃ vastrādi udakaṃ
GK16andhvc2u:2422: sa ca sarvarasasādhāraṇo guṇaḥ sarvaracanāsādhāraṇaśca vyaṅgyārthāpekṣayaiva mukhyatayā vyavasthito mantavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2424: upacārāttu tathāvidhe vyaṅgye 'rthe yacchabdārthayoḥ samarpaktvaṃ tadapi
GK16andhvc2u:2427: nanu rasagato gumastatkathaṃ śabdārthayoḥ svacchatetyāśaṅkyāha---sa ceti /
GK16andhvc2u:2431: sarvāyeyaṃ racanā śabdagatā cārthagatā ca samastā cāsamastā ca tatra sādhāramaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2433: arthasya tāvatsamarpaktvaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ pratyeva sambhavati nānyathā /
GK16andhvc2u:2434: śabdasyāpi svavācyārpaktvaṃ nāma kiyadalaukikaṃ yena gumaḥ syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2435: evaṃ mādhuryaujaḥprasādā eva trayo guṇā upapannā bhāmahābhiprāyeṇa /
GK16andhvc2u:2436: te ca pratipattrāsvādamayā mukhyatayā tata āsvādye upacaritā rase tatastadvyañjakayoḥ śabdārthayoriti tātparyam // 10 //
GK16andhvc2u:2437: bālaprayā nanvevaṃ prasādo guṇaḥ kāvyaniṣṭhatvena kathamukta ityata
GK16andhvc2u:2449: saḥ sarvarasasādhāraṇa eva guṇaḥ, sa eva sarvarasasādhāraṇo guṇa iti dvedhāvadhāraṇamatretyāha---sarvetyādi
GK16andhvc2u:2461: śabdārthayostattadarpakatvaṃ na guṇaḥ, kintu rasasyaiva svātmāveśena
GK16andhvc2u:2462: jhaṭiti sahṛdayahṛdayavyāpakatvamato mukhyatayā rasaniṣṭha eva prasādākhyo
GK16andhvc2u:2473: tattadāsvādāḥ tattadrasacarvaṇājanyā ityāsvādyetattadrase te upacaritā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2477: śruti-duṣṭādayo doṣā anityā ye ca darśitāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2478: dhvany-ātmany eva śṛṅgāre te heyā ity udāhṛtāḥ // DhvK_2.11 //
GK16andhvc2u:2479: śrutiduṣṭādayo doṣā anityā ye ca darśitāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2481: anityā doṣāśca ye śrutiduṣṭādayaḥ sūcitāste 'pi na vātye arthamātre, na ca vyaṅgye śṛṅgāvyatirekiṇi śṛṅgāre vā dhvaneranātmamūte /
GK16andhvc2u:2482: kiṃ tarhi? dhvanyātmanyeva śṛṅgāre 'ṅgitayā vyaṅgye te heyā ityudāhṛtāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2485: locanam evamasmatpakṣa eva guṇālaṅkāravyavahāro vibhāgenopapadyata iti pradarśya nityānityadoṣavibhāgo 'pyasmatpakṣa eva saṅgacchata iti
GK16andhvc2u:2523: viṣayavibhāgapradarśanena viṣayavibhāgaṃ pradarśya, na tu pradarśitamiti
GK16andhvc2u:2524: tasyāṅgānāṃ prabhedā ye prabhedāḥ svagatāś ca ye /
GK16andhvc2u:2526: tasyāṅgānāṃ prabhedā ye prabhedāḥ svagatāśca ye /
GK16andhvc2u:2528: aṅgitā vyaṅgyo rasādirvivakṣitānyaparavācyasya dhvanereka ātmā ya uktastasyāṅganāṃ vācyavācakānupātināmalaṅkārāṇāṃ ye prabhedā niravadhayo ye ca svagatāstasyāṅgino 'rthasya rasabhāvatadābhāsatatpraśamalakṣaṇā vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicāripratipādanasahitā anantāḥ svāśrayāpekṣayā niḥ---
GK16andhvc2u:2531: bībhatsahāsyalaudrādau tveṣāmasmābhirupagamāt śṛṅgārādau ca varjanādanityatvaṃ ca doṣatvaṃ ca samarthitameveti /
GK16andhvc2u:2535: ātmagatāḥ sambhogavipralambhādyā ātmīyagatā vibhāvādigatāsteṣāṃ loṣṭaprastāreṇāṅgāṅgibhāve kā gaṇaneti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2539: bhinnavṛttādidoṣā iva śrutiduṣṭādadoṣā api bhāmahādibhiruktāḥ, na tveṣāmanityatvamuktamityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:2549: apyarthāstucchaśabdenābhidhīyamānā na tathā camatkārāya ityanuprāsādayaḥ śabdadvārema rasādyupakārakāḥ, upamādayaśca rasādyabhivyañjakavibhāvādyarthotkarṣādhānadvāreṇa rasādyupaskārakā
GK16andhvc2u:2552: alaṅkārā hi vibhāvādyutkarṣayanto bahudhoddīpanāḥ kvacidanubhāvā api yathā nāyakādikṛtanāyikādivarṇana ityapyāhuri"ti /
GK16andhvc2u:2561: "pāde sarvagurā"vityādinā vṛttaratnākare lakṣitaḥ, tadrītyā bhedānāṃ gaṇanamaśakyamityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:2565: sīmāno viśeṣāsteṣāmanyonyasambandhandhaparikalpane kriyamāṇe kasyacidanyatamasyāpi rasasya prakārāḥ parisaṅkhyātuṃ na śakyante kimuta sarveṣām /
GK16andhvc2u:2566: tathā hi śṛṅgārasyāṅginastāvadādyau dvau bhedau-sambhogo vipralambhaśca /
GK16andhvc2u:2572: yathā 'sukhayatīti kimucyata' ityaḥ prabhṛti vatsarājaratnāvalyoḥ, na tu pūrvaṃ ratnāvalyāḥ tadā hi bālapriyā 'vipralambhasyāpī'tyādigranthaṃ
GK16andhvc2u:2575: idaṃ ratnāvalīnāṭikāyāṃ vidūṣakaṃ prati vatsarājasya vacanam /
GK16andhvc2u:2579: etadvacanaśravaṇenaiva rājñaḥ svasminnanurāgasya ratnāvalyā niścayāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2584: teṣāṃ ci deśakālādyāśrayāvasthābheda iti svagatabhedāpekṣayaikasya tasyāparimeyatvam, kiṃ punaraṅgaprabhedakalpanāyām /
GK16andhvc2u:2589: punaḥ khaṇḍitayā prasādyamānayāpi prasādamagṛhṇantyā tataḥ paścāttāpaparītatvena virahotkaṇṭhitayā saha mantavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2592: vañcanāyāṃ hyabhilaṣito viṣayo na labhyate; evamatra /
GK16andhvc2u:2595: āśrayo malayādiḥ mārutādīnāṃ vibhāvānāmiti yaducyate taddeśaśabdena gatārtham /
GK16andhvc2u:2597: yathā mamaiva--- dayitayā grathitā sragiyaṃ mayā hṛdayadhāmani nityaniyojitā /
GK16andhvc2u:2616: vṛttau 'teṣāṃ ca pratyekam' iti 'teṣāṃ ca deśe'tyubhayatra sthiteteṣāmiti pade krameṇa vivṛṇoti---ekatretyādi
GK16andhvc2u:2630: diṅmātrakathanena hi vyutpannānāṃ sahṛdayānāmekatrāpi rasabhede sahālaṅkārairaṅgāṅgibhāvaparijñānādāsāditālokā buddhiḥ sarvatraiva bhaviṣyati /
GK16andhvc2u:2633: sarveṣv eva prabhedeṣu nānuprāsaḥ prakāśakaḥ // DhvK_2.14 //
GK16andhvc2u:2651: ekarūpaṃ tvanubandhaṃ tyaktvā vicitro 'nuprāso nibadhyamāno na doṣāyetyekarūpagrahaṇam yamakādītyādiśabdaḥ prakāravācī /
GK16andhvc2u:2653: śabdabhaṅgana bālapriyā virahapīḍāhetubhūtāyā api srajo dayitāgrathanarūpakāraṇaviśeṣādvirahapīḍāparihārakasudhārasasrāvakatvamuktamiti kāraṇakṛto bhedaḥ // 12 //
GK16andhvc2u:2662: śaktāv api pramāditvaṃ vipralambhe viśeṣataḥ // DhvK_2.15 //
GK16andhvc2u:2664: dhvanerātmabhūtaḥ śṛṅgārastātparyeṇa vācyavācakābhyāṃ prakāśyamānastasminyamakādīnāṃ yamakaprakārāṇāṃ nibandhanaṃ duṣkaraśabdabhaṅgaśleṣādīnāṃ śaktāvapi pramāditvam /
GK16andhvc2u:2665: 'pramāditvā'mityanenaitaddṛśyate---kākatālīyena kadācitkasyacidekasya yamakāderniṣpattāvapi bhūmnālaṅkārāntaravadrasāṅgatvena nibandho na kartavya iti /
GK16andhvc2u:2667: tasmindyotye yamakāderaṅgasya nibandho niyamānna kartavya iti /
GK16andhvc2u:2674: arthaśleṣo na doṣāya 'raktastvaṃ' ityādau; śabdabhaṅgo 'pi vilaṣṭa eva duṣṭaḥ, na tvaśokādau yuktirit /
GK16andhvc2u:2684: abhaṅgaśleṣo 'rthaśleṣaśca prācāṃ mate eka eveti sphaṣṭaṃ kāvyapradīpādau
GK16andhvc2u:2689: aśokapadaṃ rūḍhyā vṛkṣaviśeṣaṃ śabdabhaṅgena nāsti śoko yasyeti yogavyutpatyā śokarahitaṃ ca vaktīti bhāvaḥvṛttau---'śaktāvapi
GK16andhvc2u:2691: " avyutpattikṛto doṣaḥ śaktyā saṃvriyate kave"riti vakṣyamāṇatvena doṣatirodhāyakaśaktau satyāmapi kaveḥ pramāditvajñāpakatvenākartavyatvātkadācitkasyacidekasya yamakāderniṣpattirna doṣāvaheti bhāvaḥ // 15 //
GK16andhvc2u:2694: 'rase'ti 'dhvanāvi'ti ca sāmānyokteḥ tātparyaṃ darśayan kārikāṃ vyācaṣṭe---rasetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:2700: śakyakriyo locanam kurvaṃstunnāntarīyakatayā yamāsādayati sa evātrālaṅkāro
GK16andhvc2u:2702: tenavīrādbhutādiraseṣvapi yamakādi kaveḥ pratipattuśca rasavighnākāryeva sarvatra /
GK16andhvc2u:2703: gaḍaḍurikāpravāhopahatasahṛdayadhurādhirohaṇavihīnalokāvarjanābhipirāyeṇa tu mayā śṛṅgāre vipralambhe ca viśeṣata ityuktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2704: tathā ca 'rase 'ṅgatvaṃ tasmādeṣāṃ na vidyate' iti sāmānyena vakṣyati /
GK16andhvc2u:2709: karakisalayanyastavadanā śvāsatāntādharā pravartamānabāṣpabharaniruddhakaṇṭī avicchinnaruditacañcatkucataṭā roṣamaparityajantī cāṭūktyā yāvatprasādyate
GK16andhvc2u:2724: tasyāḥ pravāheṇa avicchedena upahatāḥ naṣṭavivekāḥ tathā sahṛdayadhurādhirohaṇena vihīnāśca ye lokāḥ janāstadāvarjanābhiprāyeṇetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2740: anubhāvo niśvāsādiḥ tasya carvamā punaḥ punaranusandhān /
GK16andhvc2u:2747: yataḥ, manyuḥ priya iti rūpakaṃ, kapola ityādyarthastatsādhakaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:2759: yathā---- kapole pattrālī karatalanirodhena mṛditā nipīto niḥśvāsairayamamṛtahṛdyo 'dhararasaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:2760: muhuḥ kaṇṭhe lagnastaralayati bāṣpastanataṭīṃ priyo manyurjātastava niranurodhe na tu vayam
GK16andhvc2u:2761: rasāṅgatve ca tasya lakṣaṇamapṛthagyatnanirvartyatvamiti yo rasaṃ bandhumadhyavasitasya kaveralaṅkārastāṃ vāsanāmatyūhya yatnāntaramāsthitasya niṣpadyate sa na rasāṅgamiti /
GK16andhvc2u:2762: yamake ca prabandhena buddhipūrvakaṃ kriyamāṇe niyamenaiva yatnāntaraparigraha āpatati śabdaviśeṣānveṣaṇarūpaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:2763: alaṅkārāntareṣvapi tattulyamiti cet---naivam; alaṅkārāntarāṇi hi nirūpapyamāṇadurghaṭanānyapi rasasamāhitacetasaḥ locanam lakṣamamiti /
GK16andhvc2u:2770: tathā nirūpyamāṇe durghaṭanāni kathametāni racitānītyevaṃ vismayāvahānītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2776: uktamarthaṃ sādhayituṃ vyatirekaṃ darśayati vṛttau'yo rasam' ityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:2794: yathā ca māyārāmaśirodarśanena vihvalāyāṃ sītādevyāṃ setau /
GK16andhvc2u:2799: yattu rasavanti kānicidyamakādīni dṛśyante, tatra rasādīnāmaṅgatā yamakādīnāṃ tvaṅgitaiva
GK16andhvc2u:2801: aṅgitayā tu vyaṅgye rase nāṅgatvaṃ pṛthakprayatnanirvartyatvādyamakādeḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2802: asyaivārthasya saṅgrahaślokāḥ---- rasavanti hi vastūni sālaṅkārāṇi kānicit /
GK16andhvc2u:2819: 'dhvanyātmabhūte śṛṅgāre iti yaduktaṃ tat prādhānyanārdhaślokena saṅgṛhīte
GK16andhvc2u:2821: bālapriyā kaveriti, vismayāvahānītyatra sahṛdayasyeti ca śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2847: sa sarvo 'pi yadi samīkṣya viniveśyate tadalakṣyakramavyaṅgyasya dhvaneraṅginaḥ sarvasyaiva cārutvaheturniṣpadyate /
GK16andhvc2u:2856: heyavarga uktaḥ, upādeyavargastu vaktavya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2867: ślokapādeṣu caturṣu ślokārdhe cāṅgatvasādhanamidam; rūpakādiriti pratyekaṃ sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2868: yamalaṅkāraṃ tadaṅgatayā vivakṣati nāṅgitvena, yamavasare gṛhṇāti,
GK16andhvc2u:2869: yamavasare tyajati, yaṃ nātyantaṃ nirveḍhumicchati, yaṃ yatnādaṅgatvena pratyavekṣate, sa evamupanibadhyamāno rasābhivyaktiheturbhavatīti vitataṃ mahāvākyam /
GK16andhvc2u:2870: tanmahāvākyamadhye codāharamāvakāśamudāhalaraṇasvarūpaṃ tadyojanaṃ tatsamarthanaṃ ca nirūpayituṃ granthāntaramati vṛtigranthasya sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2872: yo 'laṅkāro yathā vyañjakaḥ, tathā ākhyāyata ityarthaṃ iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2876: 'eṣā samīkṣe'ti vṛttāvuktaṃ, samīkṣāyāḥ ko 'tra prastāva ityata āha
GK16andhvc2u:2884: yathā---- calāpāṅgāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ spṛśasi bahuśo vepathumatīṃ rahasyākhyāyīva
GK16andhvc2u:2886: karau vyādhunvatyāḥ pibasi ratisarvasvamadharaṃ vayaṃ tattvānveṣānmadhukara hastāstvaṃ khalu kṛtī //
GK16andhvc2u:2889: he madhukara, vayamevaṃvidhābhilāṣacāṭupravaṇā api tattvānveṣamādvastuvṛtte 'nviṣyamāṇe hatā āyāsamātrapātrībhūtā jātāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2890: tvaṃ khalviti nipātenāyatnasiddhaṃ tataiva caritārthatvamiti śakuntalāṃ pratyabhilāṣiṇo duṣyantasyeyamuktiḥ
GK16andhvc2u:2892: kathameṣāsmadabhiprāyavyañjakaṃ rahovacanamākarṇyāt, kathaṃ nu haṭhādanicchantatyā api paricumbanaṃ vidheyāsmeti yadasmākaṃ manorājyapadavīmadhiśete tattavāyatnasiddham /
GK16andhvc2u:2893: bhramaro hi nīlotpaladhiyā tadāśaṅkākarīṃ dṛṣṭiṃ punaḥpunaḥ spṛśati /
GK16andhvc2u:2914: kadācidrasāditātparyeṇa vivakṣito 'pi hmalaṅkāraḥ kaścidaṅgitvena vivakṣito dṛśyate /
GK16andhvc2u:2917: atra hi paryāyoktasyāṅgitvena vivakṣā rasāditātparye satyapīti /
GK16andhvc2u:2919: cakrābhighāta eva prasabhājñā alaṅghanīyo niyogastayā yo rāhudayitānāṃ ratotsavaṃ cumbanamātraśeṣaṃ cakāra /
GK16andhvc2u:2920: yata āliṅganamuddāmaṃ pradhānaṃ yeṣu vilāseṣu tairvandhyaḥ śūnyo 'sau
GK16andhvc2u:2922: atrāha kaścit--'paryāyoktamevātra kaveḥ prādhānyena vivakṣitaṃ, na tu rasādi /
GK16andhvc2u:2925: sa cātra cārutvahetutayā na cakāsti, api tu paryāyoktamevala /
GK16andhvc2u:2926: yadyapi cātra kāvye na kāciddoṣāśaṅkā, tathāpi
GK16andhvc2u:2934: vastuto 'tra na rūpakaṃ, kintu samāsoktirityāśayenāsvarasasūcanāya anya
GK16andhvc2u:2954: tathā ca paryāyoktasya prādhānye 'pi na kṣatiriti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2971: adyodyānalatāmimāṃ samadanāṃ nārīmivānyāṃ dhruvaṃ paśyan kopavipāṭaladyuti mukhaṃ devyāḥ kariṣyāmyaham
GK16andhvc2u:2972: locanam tathā ca granthakāra evamagre darśayiṣyati /
GK16andhvc2u:2973: mahātmanāṃ dūṣaṇoddhoṣaṇamātmana eva dūṣaṇamiti nedaṃ dūṣaṇodāharaṇaṃ dattam /
GK16andhvc2u:2979: saha madanākhyena vṛkṣaviśeṣema madanena kāmena ca /
GK16andhvc2u:2980: atropamāśleṣar irṣyāvipralambhasya bhāvino mārgapariśodhaktvena sthitastaccarvaṇābhimukhyaṃ kurvannavasare rasasya pramukhībhāvadaśāyāṃ puraḥsarāyamāṇo gṛhīta iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2986: svaparigṛhītāṃ nabamālikālatāṃ dohadaviśeṣeṇa puṣpitāmavagatavato vatsarājasya narmasacivaṃ prati vacanam /
GK16andhvc2u:2987: 'ahamadya imāmudyānalatāmanyāṃ nārīmiva paśyan devyā mukhaṃ kopavipāṭaladyuti kariṣyāmī'tyanvayaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:2988: mayi anyanārīmiva puṣpitāṃ madīyalatāṃ paśyati, tatpaśyantyā svaparigṛhītamādhavīlatāyāḥ puṣpodgamābhāvena janitakopāyā vāsavadattāyā mukhamātāmradyupi yathā bhaviṣyati tathā kariṣyāmītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3014: yathā---- raktastvaṃ navapallavairahamapi ślādhyaiḥ priyāyā guṇai-
GK16andhvc2u:3016: kāntāpādatalāhītastava mude tadvanmamāpyāvayoḥ sarvaṃ tulyamaśoka kevalamahaṃ dhātrā saśokaḥ kṛtaḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:3022: tatra ca prabodhako vibhāvastadīyaṣallavarāga iti mantavyam /
GK16andhvc2u:3029: priyāyā guṇairanurakto 'hamudbuddhānurāga iti tantrādinā arthaṃ iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3040: yatastvāṃ smadhanurmuktāḥ kāmacāpānnirgatāḥ śilīmukhāḥ bhramarā āyānti,
GK16andhvc2u:3041: tato māmapi tathā smaradhanurmuktāḥ kāmacāpānnirgatāḥ śilīmukhāḥ śarā āyānti /
GK16andhvc2u:3043: yadyapyatra kāntāpādatalenāhatiḥ tava mude puṣpavikāsāya bhavati,
GK16andhvc2u:3044: tadvattathā kāntāpādatalāhatiḥ ratabandhaviśeṣaḥ mama mude santoṣāya bhavatīti yatāśrutārthaḥ, tatāpi svakāntāpādatalāhananenāśokasya puṣpavikāse sati nāyakasya santīṣo bhavatīti yatastava mude tato mamāpi
GK16andhvc2u:3045: mude iti hetutvena vyākhyeya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3046: atra hi prabandhapravṛtto 'pi śloṣo vyatirekavivakṣayā tyajyamāno
GK16andhvc2u:3048: nātrālaṅkāradvayasannipātaḥ, kiṃ tarhi? alaṅkārāntarameva śleṣavyatirekalakṣamaṃ narasiṃhavaditi cet--na; tasya prakārāntarema vyavasthāpanāt /
GK16andhvc2u:3049: yatra hi śleṣaviṣaya eva śabde prākarāntareṇa vyatirekapratītirjāyate sa tasya viṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3054: saśokaśabdena vyatirekamānayatā śokasahabhūtānāṃ nirvedacintādīnāṃ vyabhicāriṇāṃ vipralambhaparipoṣakāṇāmavakāśo dattaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3056: saṅkārālaṅkāra eka evāyam; tatra kiṃ tyaktaṃ kiṃ vā gṛhītamiti
GK16andhvc2u:3061: saḥ hariḥ, yadi vā saha haribhiḥ sahaririti /
GK16andhvc2u:3071: prakṛtarasānuguṇālaṅkārāntaravivakṣayā gṛhītapūrvasyālaṅkārasya tyāgaḥ prakṛtarasāṅgaṃ bhavatīti prakṛte vyatirekasya vipralambhapoṣakatvaṃ vivṛṇoti---saśokaśabdenetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:3086: alaṅkāradvayasya yā pratibhā pratītistasyā ullāsaḥ udaya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3096: aśvavācino hariśabdasya sahaśabdena samāsa ityāśayena dvitīyaṃ sahariśabdaṃ vyācaṣṭe--yadi vetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:3102: antyapāde atra hyanya eva śabdaḥ śleṣasya viṣayo 'nyaśca vyatirekasya /
GK16andhvc2u:3103: yadi caivaṃvidhe viṣaye 'laṅkārāntaratvakalpanā kriyate tatsaṃsṛṣṭerviṣayāpahāra eva syāt
GK16andhvc2u:3104: śleṣamukhainaivātra vyatirekasyātmalābha iti nāyaṃ saṃsṛṣṭerviṣaya iti
GK16andhvc2u:3107: yathā--- no kalpāpāyavāyoradayarayadalatkṣyādhārasyāpi śamyā locanam atra hīti /
GK16andhvc2u:3113: evaṃvidhe vākyalakṣaṇe viṣaye viṣaya ityekatvaṃ vivakṣitaṃ bodhyam /
GK16andhvc2u:3116: nanūpamāgarbho vyatirekaḥ; upamā ca śleṣamukhenaivāyāteti śleṣo 'tra
GK16andhvc2u:3122: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ---kiṃ sarvatropamāyāḥ svaśabdenābhidhāne vyatireko bhavatyuta gamyamānatve /
GK16andhvc2u:3129: yadyapyatra sahariḥ sahaririti dve upātte, tathāpi tayorekānupūrvīṅkatvenaikaviṣayakatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3146: nikhiladvīpadīpasya dīptireva anyarūpā, sā prasiddhā eva vartiḥ vaḥ sukhayatviti sambandhaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:3147: anyarūpetyanena darśitaṃ dīptervaidharmyaṃ no katpetyādinā kathyate /
GK16andhvc2u:3149: vāyoriti kartari ṣaṣṭī gāḍhamudgīrṇā gāḍhodgīrṇojjvalaśrīrahani na rahitā no tamaḥkajjalena
GK16andhvc2u:3150: prāptotpattiḥ pataṅgānna punarupagatā moṣamuṣṇātviṣo vo vartiḥ saivānyarūpā sukhayatu nikhiladvīpadīpasya dīptiḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:3151: atra hi sāmyaprapañjapratipādanaṃ vinaiva vyatareko darśitaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3152: nātra locanam tama eva kajjalaṃ tena /
GK16andhvc2u:3153: na no rahitāṃ api tu rahitaiva /
GK16andhvc2u:3159: sāmyasyopamāyāḥ prapañcena prabandhena yatpratipādanaṃ svaśbadena tena vināpītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3160: etaduktaṃ bhavati---pratīyamānaivopamā vyatirekasyānugrāhiṇī bhavantī nābhidhānaṃ svakaṇṭhenāpekṣate
GK16andhvc2u:3162: nanu yadyapyanyatra naivaṃ, tatāpīha tatprāvaṇyenaiva sopāttā;
GK16andhvc2u:3163: tadaprāvaṇye svayaṃ cārutvahetutvābhāvāditi śleṣopamātra pṛthagalaṅkārabhāvameva na bhajate
GK16andhvc2u:3165: etadasiddhaṃ svasaṃvedanabādhitatvāditi hṛdaye gṛhītvā svasaṃvedanamapahnuvānaṃ bālapriyā āvirbhāvitā ujvalā śrīryayā sā /
GK16andhvc2u:3192: kintu vyatirekema sahānugrahyānugrāhakabhāvaṃ bhajate iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3196: śleṣamātraccārutvapratītirnāsti iti na svato 'laṅkāratā ityapi na vācyam'
GK16andhvc2u:3206: śleṣamātrāccārutvapratītirastīti śleṣasya vyatirekāṅgatvenaiva vivakṣitatvāt na svato 'laṅkāratetyapi na vācyam /
GK16andhvc2u:3207: yata evaṃvide viṣaye sāmyamātrādapi supratipāditāccārutvaṃ dṛśyata eva /
GK16andhvc2u:3210: antarme dayitāmukhaṃ tava śaśī vṛttiḥ samaivāvayo- statkiṃ māmaniśaṃ sakhe
GK16andhvc2u:3213: locanam paraṃ śleṣaṃ vinopamāmātrema cārutvasampannamudāharaṇāntaraṃ darśayanniruttarīkaroti--yata ityādinā /
GK16andhvc2u:3224: 'ākrandā' ityādisthale śleṣaṃ vinā upamāgarbhavyatirekeṇaiva cārutvasya darśanā'draktastva'mityādāvapi śleṣasya vyatirekānugrāhakatvaṃ vinā
GK16andhvc2u:3228: me ākrandāḥ tava stanitaitaistulyā ityādi sambandhanīyamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3241: aniśaṃ dagdhuṃ pīḍayitumeva, na tu kadācitsukhayitumapi /
GK16andhvc2u:3243: 'udyataḥ' ayamudyamo na yuktaḥ, ahantu naivaṃvidha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3244: atra bandhujanapīḍākāritvena jaladharasya svasmādvyatireka uktaḥ, sāmyaṃ cādāvuktam /
GK16andhvc2u:3252: yathā--- kopātkomalalobāhulatikāpāśena baddhvā dṛḍhaṃ nītvā vāsaniketanaṃ dayitayā sāyaṃ sakhīnāṃ puraḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3253: bhūyo naivamiti skhalatkalagirā saṃsūcya duśceṣṭitaṃ dhanyo hanyata eva ninhutiparaḥ preyānrudatyā hasan //
GK16andhvc2u:3254: atra he rūpakamākṣiptamanirvyūḍhaṃ ca paraṃ rasapuṣṭaye /
GK16andhvc2u:3255: nirvoḍhumiṣṭamapi yaṃ yatnādaṅgatvena pratyavekṣate yathā--- śyāmāsvaṅgaṃ cakitahariṇīprekṣaṇe dṛṣṭipātaṃ locanam evaṃ grahaṇatyāgau samarthya
GK16andhvc2u:3258: bāhulatikāyāḥ bandhanīyapāśatvena rūpaṇaṃ yadi nirvāhayet, dayitā vyādhavadhūḥ vāsagṛhaṃ kārāgārapañjarādīti paramanaucityaṃ syāt /
GK16andhvc2u:3260: bhavatyo 'navarataṃ bruvate nāyamevaṃ karotīti tatpaśyantvidānīmiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3261: skhalantī kopāveśena kalā madhurā ca gīryasyāḥ sā /
GK16andhvc2u:3263: evamiti yaduktaṃ tatkimityāha--duśceṣṭitaṃ nakhapadāda saṃsūcya aṅgulyādinirdeśena /
GK16andhvc2u:3266: yato 'sau hasanaṃ nimittīkṛtya nihnutiparaḥ priyatamaśca tadīyaṃ vyalīlaṃ
GK16andhvc2u:3272: dayitādīnāṃ vyādhavadhūtvādirūpaṇasya kathanena bāhulatikāyāḥ pāśatvarūpaṇaṃ kavirnirvāhayedyadītyarthaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:3288: śyāmānāṃ viśiṣyoktau bījabhūtamaṅgasāthadharmyaṃ gaṇḍacchāyāṃ śaśini śikhināṃ barhabhāreṣu keśān /
GK16andhvc2u:3289: atpaśyāmi pratanuṣu nadīvīciṣu bhrūvilāsān hantaikasthaṃ kvacidapi na te bhīru sādṛśyamasti
GK16andhvc2u:3293: lakṣyaṃ ca tathāvidhaṃ mahākaviprabandheṣvapi dṛśyate bahuśaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3294: tattu sūktitasahasradyotitātmānāṃ mahātmanāṃ doṣoddhoṣaṇamātmana eva dūṣaṇaṃ bhavatīti na vibhajya darśitam /
GK16andhvc2u:3295: kiṃ tu rūpakāderalaṅkāravargasya yeyaṃ vyañjakatve rasādiviṣaye lakṣaṇadigdarśitā tāmanusaran svayaṃ cānyallakṣaṇamutprekṣamāṇo yadyalakṣyakramapratibhamanantaroktamenaṃ locanam pāṇḍamnā tanimnā kaṇṭakitatvena ca yogāt /
GK16andhvc2u:3299: hanteti kaṣṭam, ekasthasādṛśyābhāve ha dolāyamāno 'haṃ sarvatra sthito na
GK16andhvc2u:3302: yo hi kātarahṛdayo bhavatināsau sarvasvamekasthaṃ dhārayatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3311: yathā mamaiva--śītāṃśoramṛtacchaṭā yada karāḥ kasmānmano me mṛśaṃ bālapriyā gamyaṃ darśayati---pāṇḍimnetyādi
GK16andhvc2u:3336: me manaḥ dhvanerātmānamupanibadhnāti sukaviḥ samāhitacetāstādā tasyātmalābho bhavati mahīyāniti
GK16andhvc2u:3342: kiṃ prāṇānna harantyuta priyatamāsañjalpamantrākṣarai- rakṣyante kimu mohamemi hahahā no vejhi keyaṃ gatiḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:3344: evaṃ vivakṣitānyaparavācyadhvaneḥ prathamaṃ bhedamalakṣyakramaṃ vicāryaṃ dvitīyaṃ bhedaṃ vibhaktumāha---krameṇetyādi
GK16andhvc2u:3350: kālakūṭānāṃ paṭalyā samūhena yaḥ saṃvāsaḥ dvayorekotpannatvātsahavāsaḥ saṃsargaṃ iti yāvat, tena sandūṣitāḥ santāpakatvādisvīyadoṣaviśiṣṭāḥ kṛtāḥ
GK16andhvc2u:3351: tarhi te kiṃ kutaḥ prāṇānna haranti? prāṇāpahārakatvasyāpi tatsvabhāvatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3354: priyatamāyāḥ sañjalpeṣu yāni mantrākṣarāṇi viṣāpahārīṇi taiḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3359: karā amṛtacchaṭā iti rūpakaṃ, kālakūṭetyādau sandehaḥ, priyatamāsañjalpeṣu mantrākṣarāropānnidarśanā
GK16andhvc2u:3363: utetyādinā punarupādanamevaṃ priyatametyādi nidarśanāyāḥ, mohaṃ mūrcchāmemi prāpnomītyanena tyāgaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3365: kā no vejhi na jānāmītyanena punarupādānaṃ ca pratyāyyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3370: yataḥ krameṇa bhāti, ato 'nusvānasannibha ityartha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3372: prakhyo ya ātmā so 'pi śūbdaśaktimūlo 'rthaśaktimūlaśceti dviprakāraḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3373: nanu śabdaśaktyā yatrārthāntaraṃ prakāśate sa yadi dhvaneḥ prakāra ucyate tadidānīṃ śleṣasya viṣaya evāpahṛtaḥ syāt, nāpahṛta ityāha---
GK16andhvc2u:3375: yasminn anuktaḥ śabdena śabda-śakty-udbhavo hi saḥ // DhvK_2.21 //
GK16andhvc2u:3378: yasmādalaṅkāro na vastumātraṃ yasmin kāvye śabdaśaktyā prakāśate sa śabdaśaktyudabhavo dhvaniratyasmākaṃ vivakṣitam /
GK16andhvc2u:3380: yathā--- yena dhvastamanobhavena balijitkāyaḥ purāstrīkṛto yaścedvṛttabhujaṅgahāravalayo gaṅgāṃ ca yo 'dhārayat /
GK16andhvc2u:3394: balino dānavānyo jayati tādṛgyena kāyo vapuḥ purāmṛtaharaṇakāle strītvaṃ prāpitaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3398: yaścāgaṃ govardhanaparvataṃ gāṃ ca bhūmiṃ pātālagatāmadhārayat /
GK16andhvc2u:3399: yasya ca nāma stutyamṛṣaya āhuḥ kiṃ tat? śaśinaṃ mathnātīti kvip rāhuḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:3400: tasya śiroharo bālapriyā anusvānapadārthaṃvivṛṇvaṃstadbhānasya kramikatvaṃ darśayanti---ghaṇṭāyā ityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:3401: vivakṣitānyaparavācya ityasya sthāne 'avivakṣitavācya' iti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3412: yasyāhuḥ śaśimacchiro hara iti stutyaṃ ca nāmāmarāḥ pāyātsa svayamandhakakṣayakarastvāṃ sarvadomādhavaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:3418: yatra tu śabdaśaktyā sāmarthyākṣiptaṃ vācyavyatiriktaṃ vyaṅgyamevālaṅkārāntaraṃ prakāśate sa dhvanerviṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3419: śabdaśaktyā sākṣādalaṅkārāntarapratibhā yathā--- tasyā vināpi hāreṇa
GK16andhvc2u:3422: atra śṛṅgāravyabhicārī vismayākhyo bhāvaḥ sākṣādvirodhālaṅkāraśca pratibhāsata iti virodhacchāyānugrāhiṇaḥ śleṣasyāyaṃ viṣayaḥ, na tvanusvānopamavyaṅgyasya dhveneḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3424: sa tvāṃ mādhavo viṣṇuḥ sarvadaḥ pāyāt /
GK16andhvc2u:3425: kīdṛk? andhakanāmnāṃ janānāṃ yena kṣayo nivāso dvārakāyāṃ kṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3426: yadi vā mausale iṣīkābhisteṣāṃ kṣayovināśo yena kṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3427: dvitīyo 'rthaḥ--yena dhvastakāmena satā balijito vidhṇoḥ sambandhī kāyaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:3429: udvṛttā bhujaṅgā eva hārā valayāśca yasya, mandākinīṃ ca yo 'dhārayat,
GK16andhvc2u:3430: yasya ca ṝṣayaḥ śaśimaccandrayuktaṃ śira āhuḥ, hara iti ca yasya nāma stutyamāhuḥ, sa bhagavānsvayamevāndhakāsurasya vināśakārī tvāṃ sarvadā kalvakālamumāyā dhavo vallabhaḥ pāyādati /
GK16andhvc2u:3431: atra vastumātraṃ dvitīyaṃ pratītaṃ nālaṅkāra iti śleṣasyaiva viṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3437: mādhavasyomādhavasya ca stotavyatvena prakṛtatvāttayoḥ sāmyaṃ na vivakṣitamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3447: alakṣyakramavyaṅgyasya tu dhvanervācyena śleṣeṇa virodhena vā vyañjitasya viṣaya eva /
GK16andhvc2u:3450: bibhrāmāṃ mukhabhindurūpamakhilaṃ candrātmacakṣurdadha- tsthāne yāṃ svatanorapaśyadadhikāṃ sā rukmiṇī vo 'vatāt //
GK16andhvc2u:3452: yathā ca--- bhramimaratimalasahṛdayatāṃ pralayaṃ mūrchāṃ tamaḥ śarīrasādam /
GK16andhvc2u:3453: maraṇaṃ ca jaladabhujagajaṃ prasahyaṃ kurute viṣaṃ viyoginīnām //
GK16andhvc2u:3457: apiśabdābhāve tu na tata evārthadvayasyābhidhā syāt, svasaundaryādeva stanayorvismayahetutvopapatteḥ
GK16andhvc2u:3459: yathā vismayaḥ śabdena pratibhāti vismaya ityanena śabdena tathā virodho
GK16andhvc2u:3489: ekatarasya tyāge grahaṇe vā yannimittaṃ tadabhāva ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3490: vācyatayaivetyasya vyatireka ityanenāpi sambandho vivakṣita ityāha---svatanoradhikāmitīti yathā vā---
GK16andhvc2u:3495: iti chāyā ) atra rūpakacchāyānugrāhī śleṣo vācyatayaivāvabhāsate /
GK16andhvc2u:3496: sa cākṣipte 'laṅkāro yatra punaḥ śabdāntareṇābhihitasvarūpasta na locanam bhujagaśabdārthaparyālocanābalādeva viṣaśabdo jalamabhidhāyāpi na
GK16andhvc2u:3500: nirāśīkṛtatvena khaṇḍitāni yāni mānasāni śatruhṛdayāni tānyeva kāñcanapaṅkajāni /
GK16andhvc2u:3503: gajendraśabdavaśāccamahimaśabdaḥ parimalaśabdo dānaśabdaśca troṭanasaurabhamadalakṣaṇānarthānpratipādyāpi na parisamāptābhidhāvyāpārā bhavantītyuktarūpaṃ dvītīyamapyarthamabhidadhatyeva /
GK16andhvc2u:3508: balādevetyasya na virantumutsahate, api tvahetyanena sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3517: prasṛtaḥ dikṣu vyāptaḥ pratāpasāro yeṣāṃ te /
GK16andhvc2u:3518: evaṃbhūtāḥ yasya bāhuparidhāḥ gajendrā eveti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3531: ubhayorarthayoḥ pratipādane abhidhāne śaktaḥ samartho yaḥ śabdaḥ tasya prayoge sati /
GK16andhvc2u:3535: yathā--- locanam nāsti, yathā--'yena dhvastamanobhavena' iti /
GK16andhvc2u:3537: yathā--'tasyā vinā' ityādau, tatra tāvatsarvathā 'camahia' ityante /
GK16andhvc2u:3539: yatrāpyabhidhāyā ekatra niyamahetuḥ prakaraṇādirvidyate tena dvitīyasminnarthe nābhidhā saṅkrāmati, tatra dvitīyo 'rtho 'sāvākṣipta
GK16andhvc2u:3540: ityucyate; tatrāpi yadi punastādṛkchabdo vidyate yenāsau niyāmakaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:3542: ata eva sābhidhāśaktirbādhitāpi satī pratiprasūteva tatrāpi na dhvanerviṣaya iti tātparyam
GK16andhvc2u:3548: bālapriyā ityasyānena sambandhaḥ, tasya kāraṇaṃ saṃyogādi /
GK16andhvc2u:3554: tamyā vinā ityādau camahia ityanta iti /
GK16andhvc2u:3565: sābhidhāśaktiḥ dvitīyārthābhidhānaśaktiḥ bādhitāpi bodhānanukūlākṛtāpi pratiprasūtā punarbodhānukūlā kṛtā /
GK16andhvc2u:3577: nanu śleṣasya śabdāntareṇa saleśādipadenābhidhānaṃ na sambhavati ityata
GK16andhvc2u:3587: dṛṣṭyā keśava goparāgahṛtayā kiñcinna dṛṣṭaṃ mayā tenaiva skhalitāsmi nātha patitāṃ kiṃ nāma nālambase /
GK16andhvc2u:3588: ekastvaṃ viṣameṣu khinnamanasāṃ sarvābalānāṃ gatir- gopyaivaṃ gaditaḥ saleśamavatādgoṣṭhe harirvaściram //
GK16andhvc2u:3589: locanam he keśava, godhūlihṛtayā dṛṣṭyā na kiñciddṛṣṭaṃ mayā tena kāraṇena skhalitāsmimārge
GK16andhvc2u:3590: tāṃ patitāṃ satīṃ māṃ kiṃ nāma kaḥ khalu heturyannalambase hastena /
GK16andhvc2u:3591: yatastvamevaiko 'tiśayena balavānnimnonnateṣu sarveṣāmabalānāṃ bālavṛddhāṅganādīnāṃ khinnamanasāṃ gantumaśaknuvatāṃ gatirālambanābhyupāya ityevaṃvidhe 'rthe yadapyete prakaraṇena niyantritābhidhāśaktayaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:3592: śabdāstathāpi dvitīye 'rthe vyākhyāsyamāne 'bhidhāśaktirniruddhā satī saleśamityanena pratyujjīvitā
GK16andhvc2u:3593: atra saleśaṃ sasūcanamityarthaḥ, alpībhavanaṃ hi sūcanameva /
GK16andhvc2u:3595: keśavagena uparāgeṇa hṛtayā dṛṣṭyeti vā sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3599: yataḥ sarvāsāmabalānāṃ madanavidhuramanasāmīrṣyākāluṣyanirāsena sevyamānaḥ san gatiḥ jīvitarakṣopāya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3623: dhavalānyaṭṭāni yena sa cāsau hāsaśca dhavalāṭṭahāsaḥ, phullāḥ vikasitāḥ mallikāḥ phullamallikāḥ phullamallikānāṃ dhavalāṭṭahāso yatra sa iti vyadhikaraṇo bahuvrīhiriti vyācṣṭe---dhavalānītyādi evañjātīyakaḥ sarva eva bhavatu kāmaṃ vācyaśleṣasya viṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3624: yatra tu sāmarthyākṣiptaṃ sadalaṅkārāntaraṃ śabdaśaktyā prakāśate sa sarva eva dhvanerviṣayaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:3630: dhavalāni hṛdyānyaṭṭānyāpaṇā yena tādṛk phullamallikānāṃ hāso vikāsaḥ sitimā yatra /
GK16andhvc2u:3634: atra ṛtuvarṇanaprastāvaniyantritābhidhāśaktayaḥ, ata eva 'avayavaprasiddheḥ samudāyaprasiddhirbalīyasī' iti nyāyamapākurvanto mahākālaprabhṛtayaḥ śabdā etamevārthamabhidhāya kṛta kṛtyā eva /
GK16andhvc2u:3651: ṛtuvarṇanarūpaḥ ṛtuvarṇanasya vā yaḥ prastāvaḥ tena niyantritāḥ tattadartheṣu niyamitāḥ abhidhāśaktayo yeṣāṃ te /
GK16andhvc2u:3658: kṛtādiyugasamayamupasaṃharan mallikādhavalamaṭṭahāsaṃ kurvan bhayaṅkaro mahākālaḥ mahān jagatsaṃhartṛdevatāviśeṣa ityādyarthabodha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3662: locanam dṛṣṭatadabhidhāśaktereva pratipatturniyantritābhidhāśaktikebhya etebhyaḥ pratipattirdhvananavyāpārādeveti śabdaśaktimūlatvaṃ vyaṅgyatvaṃ
GK16andhvc2u:3667: eke tu---'śabdaśleṣe tāvadbhede sati śabdasya, arthaśleṣe 'pi
GK16andhvc2u:3669: sa ca kadācitabhidhāvyāpārāt yathobhayoruttaradānāya 'śvato dhāvati' iti;
GK16andhvc2u:3671: yatra tu dhvananavyāpārādeva bālapriyā arthāntare jagatsaṃhartṛdevatāviśeṣādyarthe /
GK16andhvc2u:3721: ka ito dhāvati, kiṅguṇaviśiṣṭaśceti dvayoḥ praśnayorityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3728: locanam śabda ānītaḥ, tatra śabdāntarabalādapi tadarthāntaraṃ pratintaraṃ pratipannaṃ pratiyamānamūlatvātpratiyamāmeva yuktam' iti /
GK16andhvc2u:3731: tadanantaraṃ tu tasya dvitīyārthasya pratipannasya prathamārthena prakāraṇikena sākaṃ yā rūpaṇā sā tāvadbhātyeva, na cānyataḥ śabdāditi sā dhvananavyāpārāt /
GK16andhvc2u:3738: bālapriyā yathā---"kāhamasmi guhā vakti praśne 'muṣmin kimuttaram /
GK16andhvc2u:3753: pratīyamānaḥ dhvananādgamyamānaḥ śabdaḥ mūlaṃ yasya tatvādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3783: anyathā dvatīyārthasya vyaṅgyatvena vastudhvanivyavahāro 'pi syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3792: tatra hi dvitīyārtha eva prādhānyena vivakṣitaḥ, prathamārthastu yathā vā--- dattānandāḥ prajānāṃ samucitasamayākṛṣṭasṛṣṭeḥ payobhiḥ pūrvāhṇe viprakīrṇā diśi diśi viramatyahni saṃhārabhājaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3795: vākyasyāsambaddhārthābhidhāyitvaṃ mā prasaṅkṣīdityaprākāraṇikaprākaraṇikārthayorupamānopameyabhāvaḥ kalpayitavyaḥ sāmarthyādityarthākṣipto 'yaṃ śleṣo na śabdopārūḍha iti vibhinna eva śleṣādanusvānīpamavyaṅgyasya dhvanerviṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3813: prollasan hāro yatra, prollasantī dhārā yatra ca saḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3814: kālāgarūṇā sa iva ca malīmasaḥ nīlaḥ payodharaḥ stanaḥ jaladharaśca /
GK16andhvc2u:3815: tasyāḥ kāminyāḥ prāvṛṣaścā kaṃ yuvānaṃ pathikañca /
GK16andhvc2u:3817: samucitasamaye pūrvamākṛṣṭāni paścātsṛṣṭāni taiḥ dīptāṃśoḥ sūryasya pāvanānāṃ paramutkṛṣṭaṃ vartamānāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3828: yathā sthāṇvīśvarākhyajanapadavarṇane bhaṭṭabāṇasya--- 'yatra ca mātaṅgagāminyaḥ śīlavatyaśca gauryo vibhavaratāśca śyāmāḥ pajharāgiṇyaśca dhavaladvijaśucivadanā madirāmodiśvasanāśca pramadāḥ' atra hi vācyo virodhastacchāyānugrāhī vā śleṣo 'yamiti na śakyaṃ vaktum /
GK16andhvc2u:3830: yatra hi sākṣācchabdāvedito virodhālaṅkārastatra hi śliṣṭoktau vācyālaṅkārasya virodhasya locanam tenopamārūpeṇa vyatirecananihnavādayo vyāpāramātrarūpā evātrāsvādapratīteḥ pradhānaṃ viśrāntisthānaṃ, na tūpameyādīti sarvatrālaṅkāradhvanau mantavyam /
GK16andhvc2u:3838: dhvalairdvijairdantaiḥ śuci nirmalaṃ vadanaṃ yāsāṃ dhavaladvijavadutkṛṣṭavipravacchuci vadanaṃ ca yāsās /
GK16andhvc2u:3840: yasyāṃ śleṣoktau kāvyarūpāyāṃ, tatra yo virodhaḥ śleṣo veti saṅkaraḥ tasya viṣayatvam /
GK16andhvc2u:3869: yathā vā mamaiva--- sarvaikaśaraṇamakṣayamadhīśamīśaṃ dhiyāṃ hariṃ kṛṣṇam
GK16andhvc2u:3871: atra hi śabdaśaktimūlānusvānarūpo virodhaḥ sphuṭameva pratīyate /
GK16andhvc2u:3873: yathā mamaiva--- khaṃ ye 'tyujjvalayanti lūnatamaso ye vā nakhodbhāsino locanam tatraiva virodhe śleṣe vā vācyālaṅkāratvaṃ suvacamiti yāvat /
GK16andhvc2u:3875: nanu mātaṅgetyādāvapi dharmadvaye yaścakāraḥ sa virodhadyotaka eva /
GK16andhvc2u:3876: anyathā pratadharmaṃ sarvadharmānte vā na kvacidvā cakāraḥ syāt yadi samuccayārthaḥ syādityabhiprāyeṇodāharaṇāntaramāha---yatheti
GK16andhvc2u:3878: yo na dhīśaḥ sa kathaṃ dhiyāmīśaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3879: yo hariḥ kapilaḥ sa kathaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3880: caturaḥ parākramayukto yasyātmā sa kathaṃ niṣkriyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3881: arīṇāmarayuktānāṃ yo nāśayitā sa kathaṃ cakraṃ vahumānena dhārayati /
GK16andhvc2u:3886: bālapriyā tathā ca virodhaśleṣasaṅkarasya vācyālaṅkṛtitvanirūpitaṃ viṣayatvamiti vākyārthaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:3892: mātaṅgagāminyaśśīlavatyaśca gauryo vibhavaratāścetyādau dharmadvayavācakānte yaścakāra ityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:3896: anyathā cakāro yadi samuccayārthassyāttadā pratidharmaṃ sarvadharmānte vā
GK16andhvc2u:3898: sarvadharmānta ityatra sarvaśabdānta iti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3899: cakārasyātra samuccayārthakatve "ghaṭañca paṭhañca pustakañcānaya, ghaṭaṃ paṭaṃ pustakañcānaya, ghaṭaṃ paṭaṃ pustakamānaya
GK16andhvc2u:3907: pratīyata ityasya dhvanyata ityartha ityāha--nocyate kenaciditi /
GK16andhvc2u:3909: ye mūrdhasvavabhāsinaḥ kṣitibhṛtāṃ ye cāmarāṇāṃ śirāṃ- syākrāmantyubhaye
GK16andhvc2u:3910: 'pi te dinapateḥ pādāḥ śriye santu vaḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:3914: arthaśaktyudbhavas tv anyo yatrārthaḥ sa prakāśate /
GK16andhvc2u:3915: yas tātparyeṇa vastv anyad vyanakty uktiṃ vinā svataḥ // DhvK_2.22 //
GK16andhvc2u:3918: locanam nakhairudbhāsante ye 'vaśyaṃ khe gagane na udbhāsanta /
GK16andhvc2u:3926: ye kiraṇāḥ lūnaṃ vināśitaṃ tamastibhiraṃ pāpañca yaiste /
GK16andhvc2u:3930: ye kiraṇāḥ, saroruhāṇāṃ pajhānāṃ śriyaṃ kāntiṃ puṣṇanti ye caraṇāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3932: adhaḥ kṛtapajhakāntayaḥ vināśitapajhakāntayaśca ye kiraṇāḥ, kṣitibhṛtāṃ parvatānām mūrdhasuśṛṅgeṣu śirassu ca ye caraṇāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3933: amarāṇāṃ devānām śirāṃsi ākrāmanti praṇāmakāle spṛśanti teṣvanavabhāsinaśca /
GK16andhvc2u:3937: gaganānudbhāsitvādibhiḥ kiraṇebhyo vyatireko dhvanita iti bodhyam // 2.1
GK16andhvc2u:3938: 'arthe'tyādi kārikāyāṃ 'anyaḥ arthaśaktyudbhavastu tatra bhavati, yatra sa arthaḥ prakāśate, ya uktiṃ vinā svatastātparyeṇa anyadvastu vyanaktī'tyanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3953: yadi lajjātmakavyabhicāripratītistarhyayamalakṣyakramavyaṅgyasyaiva dhvanerviṣayo na tu vastudhvaneriti śaṅkate--'na ce'tyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:3956: kathanamasaṅgataṃ, yatrārthaḥ svasāmarthyādarthāntaramabhivyanākti śabdavyāpāraṃ vinaiva so 'rthaśakyudbhavo nāmānusvānopamavyaṅgyo dhvaniḥ /
