GK16andhvc2u:3959: atra hi līlākamalapatrragaṇanamupasarjanīkṛtasvarūpaṃ śabdavyāpāraṃ vinaivārthāntaraṃ vyabhicāribhāvalakṣaṇaṃ prakāśayati /
GK16andhvc2u:3961: yato yatra sākṣācchabdaniveditebhyo vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicāribhyo rasādīnāṃ pratītiḥ, sa tasya kevalasya mārgaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3962: yathā kumārasambhave madhuprasaṅge vasantapuṣpābharaṇaṃ vahantyā devyā āgamanādivarṇanaṃ manobhavaśarasandhānaparyantaṃ śambhośca parivṛttadhairyasya ceṣṭāviśeṣavarṇanādi sākṣācchabdaniveditam /
GK16andhvc2u:3969: vyabhicāraṇāṃ yatrālakṣyakramatayā vyavadhivandhyaiva pratipattiḥ svavibhāvādabalāttatra sākṣācchabdaniveditatvaṃ vivakṣitamiti na pūrvāparavirodhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3970: pūrvaṃ hyuktaṃ vyabhicāriṇāmapi bhāvatvānna svaśabdataḥ pratipattirityādi vistarataḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3971: etaduktaṃ bhavati--yadyapi rasabhāvādirartho dhvanyamāna eva bhavati na vācyaḥ kadācidapi, tathāpi na sarvo 'lakṣyakramasya viṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3972: yatra hi vibhāvānubhāvebhyaḥ sthāyigatebhyo vyabhicārigatebhyaśca pūrṇobhyo jhaṭityeva bālapriyā tasya tadabhāvasya pūrvamuktatvādityatassākṣācchabdaniveditatvaṃ vivṛṇoti locane---vyabhicāriṇāmityādi 'yatra vyabhicāriṇāṃ svasvavibhāvādibalādalakṣyakramatayā vyavadhivandhyaiva pratipattiri'tyanvayaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:3981: ityādāvityādipadena 'āvarjitā kiñcidive'tyādeḥ iha tu sāmarthyākṣiptavyabhicārimukhena rasapratītiḥ tasmādayamanyo dhvaneḥ prakāraḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3987: saṃmohanaṃ nāma ca puṣpadhanvā dhanuṣyamoghaṃ samadhatta bāṇam /
GK16andhvc2u:3991: atra hi bhagavatyāḥ prathamameva tatpravaṇatvāttasya cedānīṃ tadunmukhībhūtatvātpraṇayipriyatayā ca pakṣapātasya sūcitasya gāḍhībhāvādratyātmanaḥ sthāyibhāvasyautsukyāvegacāpalyaharṣādeśca vyabhicāriṇaḥ sādhāraṇībhūto 'nubhāvavargaḥ prakāśita iti vibhāvānubhāvacarvaṇaiva vyabhicāricarvaṇāyāṃ paryavasyati /
GK16andhvc2u:3993: iha tu pajhadalagaṇanamadhomukhatvaṃ cānyathāpi kumārīṇāṃ sambhāvyata iti jhaṭiti na lajjāyāṃ viśramayati hṛdayaṃ, api tu prāgvṛttatapaścaryādivṛttāntānusmaraṇena bālapriyā parigrahaḥ sampūrṇetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:4009: sūcito yaḥ pakṣapātaḥ gāḍhībhāvadrasātmakasthāyirūpaḥ tasya vyabhicāriṇaśca, yo 'nubhāvavarga iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4033: yatra ca śabdavyāpārasahāyo 'rthontarasya vyañjakatvenopādīyate sa nāsya
GK16andhvc2u:4039: rasastvatrāpi dūrata eva vyabhicārisvarūpe paryālocyamāne bhātīti tadapekṣayālakṣyakramataiva
GK16andhvc2u:4050: yadyapi cātra śabdāntarasannidhāne 'pa pradoṣārthaṃ prati na
GK16andhvc2u:4051: kasyacidabhidhāśaktiḥ padasyeti vyañjakatvaṃ na vighaṭitaṃ, tathāpi śabdenaivoktamayamartho 'rthāntarasya vyañjaka iti /
GK16andhvc2u:4063: tarhi kathamatra lakṣyakramatvamuktamityata āha--lajjeti evaśabdaḥ kevalaśabdaśceti /
GK16andhvc2u:4069: viṭaṃ saṅketakāle mano yasya taṃ tajjijñāsum /
GK16andhvc2u:4070: ata eva hasadbhyāṃ netrābhyāmarpitaṃ sūcitaṃ ākūtaṃ saṅketakālajijñāsārūpābhiprāyo yena tam
GK16andhvc2u:4088: śabdaśaktyārthaśaktyā śabdārthaśaktyā vākṣipto 'pi vyaṅgyo 'rthaḥ kavinā punaryatra svoktyā prakāśīkriyate so 'smādanusvānopamavyaṅgyāddhvaneranya
GK16andhvc2u:4090: alakṣyakramavyaṅgyasya vā dhvaneḥ sati sambhave sa tādṛganyo 'laṅkāraḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4092: yathā kaścidāha--'gambhīro 'haṃ na me kṛtyaṃ ko 'pi veda na sūcitam /
GK16andhvc2u:4096: prakāntaprakāradvayopasaṃhāraṃ tṛtīyaprakārasūcanaṃ caikenaiva yatnena karomītyāśayena sādhāraṇamavataraṇapadaṃ prakṣipati vṛttikṛt---tathā ceti
GK16andhvc2u:4097: tena coktaprakāradvayenāyamapi tṛtīyaḥ prakāro mantavya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4100: na dhvanirasau, api tu śleṣādiralaṅkāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4104: gambhīro janassvakṛtyaṃ vācā na vadati, kintu kadācitsūcayatīti lokasthitimabhipretya kasyaciduktiriyam
GK16andhvc2u:4106: ataḥ me kṛtyaṃ sūcitaṃ sat ko 'pi na veda na jānāti /
GK16andhvc2u:4113: uktābhiprāyeṇaiva vṛttau 'vyañjakatvamuktyaiva nivedita' mityuktaṃ, na tu vyaṅgyārthaḥ śabdāntareṇa pradarśita itītyāha--ata eveti // 2.2 //
GK16andhvc2u:4121: śabdaścārthaśca śabdārthau śabdārthauca śabdārthau ca śabdārthāḥ teṣāṃ śaktetyarthātrrividho 'pi bhedassaṅgṛhīta iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4128: sāmyetyādyantapādo dvedhā vṛttau vivṛtaḥ, tadanurodhenādyamarthaṃ vivṛṇoti locane---na dhvanirityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:4129: tatra śabdaśaktyā yathā--- vatse mā gā viṣādaṃ śvasanamurujavaṃ santyajordhvapravṛttaṃ kampaḥ ko vā guruste bhavatu balabhidā jṛmbhitenātra yāhi /
GK16andhvc2u:4130: pratyākhyānaṃ surāṇāmiti bhayaśamanacchajhanā kārayitvā yasmai lakṣmīmadvādvaḥ sa dahatu duritaṃ manthamūḍhāṃ payodhiḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:4131: locanam sa vyaṅgyo 'rtho 'nyo vācyamātrālaṅkārāpekṣayā dvitīyo lokottaraścālaṅkāra ityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:4135: kampo 'pāmpatiḥ ko brahmā vā tava guruḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4137: jṛmbhitaṃ ca gātrasaṃmardanātmakaṃ balaṃ bhinatti āyāsakāritvāt /
GK16andhvc2u:4140: sā hi kamalā puṇḍarīkākṣameva hṛdaye nidhāyotthiteti svayameva devāntarāṇāṃ pratyākhyānaṃ karoti /
GK16andhvc2u:4141: svabhāvasukumāratayā tu mandarāndolitajaladhitaraṅgabhaṅgaparyākulīkṛtāṃ tena pratibodhayatā tatsamarthācaraṇamanyatra doṣodghāṭanena atra yāhīti cābhinayaviśeṣeṇa sakalaguṇādaradarśakena kṛtam /
GK16andhvc2u:4150: he vatse tvaṃ viṣādaṃ duḥkhaṃ mā gāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4151: ūrdhvapravṛttamurujavaṃ śvasanaṃ dīrghaśvāsaṃ santyaja saṃvṛṇviti ca
GK16andhvc2u:4179: arthaśaktyā yathā---- ambā śete 'tra vṛddhā pariṇatavayasāmagraṇaritra tāto niḥśeṣāgārakarmaśramaśithilatanuḥ kumbhadāsī tathātra /
GK16andhvc2u:4180: asmin pāpāhamekā katipayadivasaproṣitaprāṇanāthā pānthāyetthaṃ taruṇyā kathitamavasaravyāhṛtivyājapūrvam
GK16andhvc2u:4182: locanam ityuktaprakāreṇa bhayanivāraṇavyājena surāṇāṃ pratyākhyānaṃ manthamūḍhāṃ lakṣmīṃ kārayitvā payodhiryasmai tāmadātsa vo yuṣmākaṃ duritaṃ dahatviti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4184: atraikaikasya padasya vyañjaktavaṃ sahṛdayaiḥ sukalpyamiti svakaṇṭhena noktam /
GK16andhvc2u:4190: bhagavatsambandhiṣu sakalaguṇeṣu ya ādaraḥ svasya bahumatistaddarśakenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4202: niśśeṣairagārakarmabhissvayamanuṣṭhitaiḥ gṛhakarmabhiḥ yaḥ śramastena śithilā asvasthā tanuryasyāḥ sā /
GK16andhvc2u:4204: avasarasya tattassthale mātrādiśayanādirūpasya prastāvasya vyāhṛtiruktiḥ tasya vyājaḥ saḥ pūrvo yatra tattathā /
GK16andhvc2u:4205: atrāvayoryathākāmaṃ rantuṃ śakyaṃ ko 'pi na jānīyāt, tvaddarśanena kāmārtā māṃ ramaṇena prīṇayeti vaktrī bodhayatīti vaktṛvaiśiṣṭyādijñānavatāṃ
GK16andhvc2u:4207: parantu vyaṅgyārtho yamavasaravyāhṛtivyājapūrvamiti vyājaśabdena kavinā āviṣkṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4209: ambā tāta ityābhyāṃ pitrornaisargikavātsalyaśālitvena tau mama sarvatrāpyanukūlāveveti /
GK16andhvc2u:4214: puruṣāntarānubhogābhāvaḥ, ata eva sambhogautsukyaṃ, katipayetyādinā patyuracirātpratyāgamanamanāśaṅkyamiti
GK16andhvc2u:4215: pativiṣayakānurāgābhāva iti ca dyotyata ityūhyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4220: artho 'pi dvividho jñeyo vastuno 'nyasya dīpakaḥ // DhvK_2.24 //
GK16andhvc2u:4224: uktastasyāpi dvau prakārau---kaveḥ kavinibaddhasya vā vaktuḥ
GK16andhvc2u:4227: yāvadatra rādhāramaṇasyākhilataruṇījanacchannānurāgagarimāspadatvaṃ na viditaṃ tāvadarthāntarasyāpratīteḥ, saleśamiti cātra svoktiḥ // 2.3 //
GK16andhvc2u:4228: evamarthaśaktyudbhavasya sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ kṛtam. śleṣādyalaṅkarebhyaścāsya vibhakto viṣaya uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4230: yo 'rthāntarasya dīpako vyañjako 'rtha uktaḥ so 'pi dvividhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4231: na kevalamanusvānopamo dvividhaḥ, yāvattadbhedo yo dvitīyaḥ so 'pa
GK16andhvc2u:4235: prakarṣema ūḍaḥ sampādayitavyena vastunā prāptastatkuśalaḥ prauḍhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4253: sajjehi surahimāso ṇa dāva appei juaijaṇalakkhamuhe /
GK16andhvc2u:4257: locanam sajjayati surabhimāso na tāvadarpayati yuvatijanalakṣyamukhān /
GK16andhvc2u:4259: atra vasantaścetano 'naṅgasya sakhā sajjayati kevalaṃ na tāvadarpayatītyevaṃvidhayā samarpayitavyavastvarpaṇakuśalayoktyā
GK16andhvc2u:4260: sahakārodbhedinī vasantadaśā yata uktā ato dhvanyamānaṃ manmathonmāthasyārambhaṃ kramema gāḍhagāḍhībhaviṣyantaṃ vyanakti /
GK16andhvc2u:4261: anyathā vasante sapallavasahakārodgama iti vastumātraṃ na vyañjakaṃ syāt /
GK16andhvc2u:4264: atra lohitaṃ bimbaphalaṃ śuko daśatīti na vyañjakatā kācit /
GK16andhvc2u:4265: yadā tu kavinibaddhasya sābhilāṣasya taruṇasya vakturitthaṃ prauḍhoktistadā vyañjakatvam /
GK16andhvc2u:4267: vṛttau---'svatassambhavī ca dvitīya' iti pāṭhaḥ kvācitkaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4269: surabhimāsaḥ vasantasambandhī māsaḥ yuvatijanā eva lakṣyāṇi yeṣāṃ tathāvidhāni mukhānyagrāṇi yeṣāṃ tān /
GK16andhvc2u:4270: lakṣasahāniti pāṭhe tāni sahante teṣveva prayojyā iti yāvattānityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4272: navāni pallavāśca patrāṇi ca tāni lānti ādadate iti tān /
GK16andhvc2u:4287: manmathonmāthanasyārambhaḥ, na tāvadarpayatītyanena bhaviṣyadarpaṇavyañjanadvārā manmathonmāthanasya bhavī gāḍhagāḍhī bhāvasca dyotyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4296: śukta ityasya sthāne ayaṃ śukapotaka iti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4303: abbhuṭṭhāṇaṃ via mammahasya diṇṇaṃ tuha thaṇohim //
GK16andhvc2u:4304: svataḥ sambhavī ya aucatyena bahirapi sambhāvyamānasadbhāvo na kevalaṃ bhaṇitivaśenaivābhiniṣpannaśariraḥ
GK16andhvc2u:4311: stanau tāvadiha pradhānabhūtau tato 'pi gauravitaḥ kāmastābhyāmabhyutthānenoparcyate /
GK16andhvc2u:4312: yauvanaṃ cānayoḥ paricārakabhāvena sthitamityevaṃvidhenoktivaicitryeṇa tvadīyastanāvaloka napravṛddhamanmathāvasthaḥ ko na bhavatīti bhaṅgyā svābhiprāyadhvananaṃ kṛtam /
GK16andhvc2u:4313: tava tāruṇyenonnatau stanāviti hi vacanena vyañjakatā /
GK16andhvc2u:4325: sādaraṃ vitīrṇo yauvanena datte yauvanahastālambo yatra tadyathā tathā /
GK16andhvc2u:4330: iti vacane sati tatpratipādyasya vyañjakatā na hītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4332: svataḥsambhavītyanena loke sambhāvyamāno 'pītyartho vivakṣita ityāśayena vṛttau 'ya' ityādinā vivṛtaṃ, tatra na kevalamityādinā gamyamarthaṃ
GK16andhvc2u:4353: locanam racitāni vividhabhaṅgībhiḥ prasādhanānīta tāsāṃ sambhogavyagrimābhāvāttadviracanaśilpakauśalameva paramiti daurbhāgyātiśaya idānīmiti prakāśitam /
GK16andhvc2u:4354: garvaśca bālyāvivekādināpi bhavatīti nātra svoktisadbhāvaḥ śaṅkyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4355: eṣa cārtho yathā yathā varṇyate āstāṃ vā varṇnā, bahirapi yadi pratyakṣādināvalokyate tathā tathā saubhāgyātiśayaṃ vyādhavadhvā dyotayati
GK16andhvc2u:4356: evamarthaśaktyudbhavo dvibhedo vastumātrasya vyañjanīyatve vastudhvanirūpatayā nirūpitaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4359: na kevalaṃ śabdaśakteralaṅkāraḥ pratīyate pūrvoktanītyā yāvadarthaśakterapi /
GK16andhvc2u:4360: yadi vā na kevalaṃ yatra vastumātraṃ pratīyate yāvalaṅkāro 'pītyapiśabdārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4381: nanu vyaṅgyo jāyāyāḥ saubhāgyātiśayo hi garvaheturityatasso 'rtho
GK16andhvc2u:4385: svataḥsasbhavī ya aucityena bahirapi sambhāvyamānetyādyuktaṃ yojayati---eṣa cārtha ityādi
GK16andhvc2u:4390: yatrāpītyapiśabdasya arthaśakterapīti alaṅkāro 'pīti yojanāṃ vikalpena darśayannāha---na kevalamityādi // 2.5 //
GK16andhvc2u:4395: sa sarvo gamyamānatvaṃ bibhrad bhūmnā pradarśitaḥ // DhvK_2.26 //
GK16andhvc2u:4398: anyatra vācyatvena prasiddho yo rūpakādiralaṅkāraḥ so 'nyatra
GK16andhvc2u:4400: tathā ca sasandehādiṣūpamārūpakātiśayoktīnāṃ prakāśamānatvaṃ pradarśitāmityalaṅkārāntarasyālaṅkārāntare vyaṅgyatvaṃ na yatnapratipādyam /
GK16andhvc2u:4402: sarva iti pradarśita iti ca padenāsambhāvanātra mithyaivetyāha /
GK16andhvc2u:4403: upamānena tattvaṃ ca bhedaṃ ca vadataḥ punaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4406: tasyāḥ pāṇirayaṃ nu mārutacalatpatrrāṅguliḥ pallavaḥ ityādāvṛpamā rūpakaṃ vā dhvanyate /
GK16andhvc2u:4410: dhvanyata iti kiyadidamasambhāvyamiti tātparyoṇālaṅkārāntaraśabdo vṛttikṛtā prayukto na tu prakṛtopayogī; na hyalaṅkāreṇālaṅkāro dhvanyata
GK16andhvc2u:4411: iti prakṛtabhadaḥ, arthaśaktyudbhave dhvanau vastvivālaṅkāro 'pi vyaṅgya ityetāvataḥ prakṛtatvāt
GK16andhvc2u:4412: tathā copasaṃhāragranthe bālapriyā tathā ca sasandehādiṣvityādivṛttigrandhaṃ vivṛṇoti---upamānenetyādi
GK16andhvc2u:4421: ślokasyāsya sampūrṇasyānavagamādyathābhātaṃ vyākhyāyate---ayaṃ tasyāḥ pāṇiḥ pallavaḥ nu itati yojanā /
GK16andhvc2u:4440: tat-paratvaṃ na vācyasya nāsau mārgo dhvaner mataḥ // DhvK_2.27 //
GK16andhvc2u:4442: tatparatvaṃ na vācyasya nāsau mārgo dhvanermataḥ // 27 //
GK16andhvc2u:4443: alaṅkārāntareṣu tvanuraṇanarūpālaṅkārapratītau satyāmapi yatra vācyasya vyaṅgyapratipādanaunmukhyena cārutvaṃ na prakāśate nāsau dhvanermārgaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4444: tathā ca dīpakādāvalaṅkāre upamāyā gamyamānatve 'pi tatparatvena cārutvasyāvyavasthānānna dhvanivyapadeśaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4446: candamaūehi ṇisā ṇalini kamalehi kusumagucchehi laā /
GK16andhvc2u:4447: locanam 'te 'laṅkārāḥ parāṃ chāyāṃ yānti dhvanyaṅgatāṃ gatāḥ' ityatra śleke vṛttikṛt 'dhvanyaṅgatā cobhobhyāṃ prākarābhyāṃ' ityupakramya
GK16andhvc2u:4449: antaraśabdo vobhayatrāpi viśeṣaparyāyaḥ; vaiṣayikī saptamī, na tu prāgvyākhyāyāmiva nimittasaptamī
GK16andhvc2u:4453: nanu pūrvaireva yadīdamuktaṃ kimarthaṃ tava yatna ityāśaṅkyāha---iyaditi /
GK16andhvc2u:4457: candramayūkhādīnāṃ na niśādinā vinā ko 'pi parabhāgalābhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4458: sajjanānāmapi kāvyakathāṃ vinā kīdṛśī bālapriyā prakṛtamityātrāha---arthetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:4462: alaṅkārāntareṇa alaṅkārāntarasya vyahkyatvamityasya ekālahkāranimittakamanyalaṅkārasya vyaṅgyatvamityarthamabhisandhāya bhāvārthe vivṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4475: atra gurvīkriyata ityasya candramayūkhairniśetyādibhiḥ pañcabhiḥ pratyekaṃ sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4476: atra niśayā candramayūkhāḥ guravaḥ kriyante ityādivipariṇāmena padānāṃ sambandhādarthasāmarthyādvā
GK16andhvc2u:4479: haṃsehi sarasohā kavvakahā sajjanehi karai garuri //
GK16andhvc2u:4482: iti chāyā) ityādiṣūpamāgarbhatve 'pi sati vācyālaṅkāramukhenaiva cārutvaṃ
GK16andhvc2u:4485: yatra tu vyaṅgyaparatvenaiva vācyasya vyavasthānaṃ tatra vyaṅgyamukhenaiva vyapadeśo yuktaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:4489: abhigamyatvamanoharatvādi, haṃsaiḥ śāradaśobhāyāḥ śrutisukhakaratvamanoharatvādi, tatsarvaṃ kāvyakathāyāḥ sajjanairityetāvānayamartho guruḥ kryita iti dīpakabalāccakāsti /
GK16andhvc2u:4490: kathāśabda idamāha---āsatāṃ tāvatkāvyasya kecana sūkṣmā viśeṣāḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:4492: teṣu tu satsvāste subhagaṃ kāvyaśabdavyapadeśabhāgapi śabdasandarbhamātram; tathā taiḥ kriyate yathādaraṇīyatāṃ pratipadyata iti
GK16andhvc2u:4493: dīpakasyaiva vyavacchedyabalena yo 'rtho 'bhimato yatra tatparatvaṃ sa
GK16andhvc2u:4495: tatra ca vācyālaṅkāreṇa kadācidvyahgyamalaṅkārāntaraṃ, yadi vā vācyālaṅkārasya sadbhāvamātraṃ na vyañjakatā, vācyālaṅkārasyābhāva bālapriyā na bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4516: sajjaneṣu haṃsādīnāṃ kāvyakathāyāṃ niśādīnāṃ ca gamyamānāyā upamāyā na prādhānyamityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:4520: yatretyādinā pradarśitasya vikalpena traividhyaṃ bhavatīti darśayati---tatra cetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:4522: yathā--- prāptaśrīreṣa kasmātpunarapi mayi taṃ manthakhedaṃ vidadhyā-
GK16andhvc2u:4524: setuṃ badhnāti bhūyaḥ kimiti ca sakaladvīpanāthānuyāta- stvayyāyāte vitarkāniti dadhata ivābhāti kampaḥ payodheḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:4527: kṣobhaṃ yadeti na manāgapi tena manye suvyaktameva jalarāśirayaṃ payodhiḥ
GK16andhvc2u:4531: kasmiṃścidanantabalasamudāyavati narapatau samudraparisaravartini pūrṇacandrodayatadīyabalāvagāhanādinā nimittena payodhestāvatkampo jātaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4534: tena ca vāsudevarūpatā bālapriyā eṣāmudāharaṇāni sphuṭībhaviṣyanti /
GK16andhvc2u:4536: eṣaḥ rājā, prāptā śrīḥ sampadramā ca yena saḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4538: manthakhedaṃ mathanahetukaṃ duḥkham kasmāt kimiti vidadhyāt kuryāt /
GK16andhvc2u:4542: asya rājñaḥ pūrvā nidrāmapyahaṃ naiva sambhāvayāmi naiva saṃśaye /
GK16andhvc2u:4545: eṣaḥ yataḥ sakaladvīpanāthairanuyātaḥ, ataḥ kimiti mayi bhūyaḥ setuṃ badhnāti /
GK16andhvc2u:4546: tvayi āyāte svasannidhimāgate sati iti vitarkān pūrvoktavākyairgamyān kiṃ mathnīyādityādisandehān
GK16andhvc2u:4547: dadhata iva taddhāraṇādiva payodheḥ kampaḥ jalacāñcalyamatha ca vepathuḥ ābhātītyanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4553: vitarkān dadhata iti vākyapratipāditena eṣaḥ kiṃ mathnīyāditi sandehena hetunetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4555: kampena kāryeṇa nimittena uktasandeharūpo hetuḥ payodhāvutprekṣyate /
GK16andhvc2u:4563: vīrāṇaṃ ramai ghusiṇaruṇammi ṇa tadā piāthaṇucchaṅge /
GK16andhvc2u:4566: yadyapi cātra vyatireko bhāti, tathāpi sa pūrvavāsudevasvarūpāt,
GK16andhvc2u:4568: adyatanatve bhagavato 'pi prāptaśrīkatvenānālasyena sakaladvīpādhipati vijayitvena ca vartamānatvāt
GK16andhvc2u:4569: na ca sandehotprekṣānupapattibalādrūpakasyākṣepaḥ, yena vācyālaṅkāropaskārakatvaṃ vyaṅgyasya bhavet /
GK16andhvc2u:4570: yo yo 'samprāptalakṣmīko nirvyājavijigīṣākrāntaḥ sa sa māṃ mathnīyādityādyarthasambhāvanāt
GK16andhvc2u:4571: na ca punarapīti pūrvāmiti bhūya iti ca śabdairayamākṛṣṭo 'rthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4573: yathā pṛthvī pūrvaṃ kārtavīryeṇa jitā punarapi jāmadagnyeneti /
GK16andhvc2u:4574: pūrvā nidrā ca siddhā rājaputrādyavasthāyāmapīti siddhaṃ rūpakadhvanirevāyamiti /
GK16andhvc2u:4584: pūrvaṃ mathanodyukto nidronmukhaḥ setubandhanodyuktaśca yo vāsudevaḥ tatsvarūpādityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:4591: nanvatra niśi vāsudevatvapratīti vinā payodheruktavitarkā na dhaṭanta ityastadvyaṅgyaṃ tadupapādakatayā guṇībhūtamiti śaṅkāṃ pariharati---na
GK16andhvc2u:4598: vāsudeva iva asamprāptalakṣmīko yo yo janaḥ, sa sa māṃ mathnīyāt /
GK16andhvc2u:4599: nirvyājavijigoṣākrānto yo yaḥ, sa sa mayi setuṃ badhnīyādityādisaṃśayasambhavādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4607: kvacit granthe prāptaśrīrityasyānantaraṃ yathā vā 'jyotsnāpūre'tyādi pāṭho
GK16andhvc2u:4608: dṛśyate, sa locanam yathā ca---- jyotsnāpūraprasaradhavale saikate 'sminsarayvā vādadyūtaṃ suciramabhavatsiddhayūnoḥ kayościt /
GK16andhvc2u:4609: eko 'vādītprathamanihataṃ keśinaṃ kaṃsamanyo matvā tattavaṃ kathaya bhavatā ko hatastatra pūrvam //
GK16andhvc2u:4610: iti kecidudāharaṇamatra paṭhanti, tadasat ; bhavatetyanena śabdabalenātra,
GK16andhvc2u:4612: lāvaṇyaṃ saṃsthānamugdhimā, kāntiḥ prabhā tābhyāṃ paripūritāni saṃvibhaktani hṛdyāni sampāditāni diṅmukhāni yena /
GK16andhvc2u:4614: smereriṣadvihasanaśīle taralāyate prasādāndolanavikāsasundare akṣiṇī yasyāstasyā āmantraṇam
GK16andhvc2u:4615: atha cādhunā na eti, vṛtte tu kṣaṇāntare kṣobhamagamat /
GK16andhvc2u:4616: kopakaṣāyapāṭalaṃ smeraṃ ca tava mukhaṃ sandhyāruṇapūrṇaśaśadharamaṇḍalameveti bhāvyaṃ kṣobheṇa calacittatayā sahṛdayasya /
GK16andhvc2u:4618: jalādayaḥ śabdā bhāvārthapradhānā bālapriyā tvapapāṭha ityāha---yathocetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:4621: bhavacchabdārthasya varṇyasya rājño hananakartṛtvoktyā tasya vāsudevābhedo yataḥ sphujīkṛtastasmādityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:4629: yeṣu mukhasya svadṛṣṭidvārā sambandhastāni diṅmukhānīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4634: adhunetyasya na eti ityanenāpi sambandha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4649: kṣobhapadasya cittacāñcalyamātrārthakatve tu mukhasya saundaryātiśaya eva dhvanenna candrābhedaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:4656: atra ca kṣobho madanavikārātmā sahṛdayasya tvanmukhāvalokanena bhavatītīyatyabhidhāyā viśrāntatayā rūpakaṃ dhvanyamānameva /
GK16andhvc2u:4657: vācyālaṅkāraścātra śleṣaḥ, sa ca na vyañjakaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4658: anuraṇanarūpaṃ yadrūpakamarthaśaktivyaṅgyaṃ tadāśrayeṇeha kāvyasya cārutvaṃ vyavatiṣṭhate
GK16andhvc2u:4661: vīrāṇāṃ ramate ghusṛṇāruṇe na tathā priyāstanotsaṅge /
GK16andhvc2u:4663: prasādhitapriyatamāśvāsanaparatayā samanantarībhūtayuddhatvaritamanaskatayā ca dolāyamānadṛṣṭitve 'pi yuddhe tvarātiśaya iti vyatireko vācyālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4664: tatra tu yeyaṃ dhvanyamānopamā priyākucakuṅmalābhyāṃ sakalajanatrāsakareṣvapi śātraveṣu mardanodyateṣu rājakumbhasthaleṣu bālapriyā iti /
GK16andhvc2u:4668: tathāvidhe mukhe prakāśamāne kṣobhaprāptyabhāvāt, janairucyamānaṃ mahajjāḍyaṃ payodherniścinomityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:4684: nanu vṛttau vīrāṇāmityudāharaṇayorupamādhvaniḥ svaśabdena kutato na yojita ityata āha--tulyetyādi
GK16andhvc2u:4687: virāṇāṃ dṛṣṭiryathā bahalasindūre ripugajakumbhasthale ramate, tathā ghusṛṇāruṇe priyāstanotsaṅge na samate ityanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4697: 'tiśayasya pratipādanāt sambhogatvarāpekṣayā yuddhe tvarātiśayo gamyata iti tasya vācyāyamānatvāt vācyalaṅkāratā /
GK16andhvc2u:4698: yadvā---iti vyatireka ityasya ityarthavyañjako vyatireka ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4711: iti chāyā ) ākṣepadhvaniryathā---- sa vaktumakhilān śakto hayagrīvāśritān guṇān /
GK16andhvc2u:4713: locanam tadvaśena ratimādadānānāmiva bahumāna iti saiva vīratātiśayacamatkāraṃ vidhatta ityupamāyāḥ prādhānyam /
GK16andhvc2u:4716: teṣāmasurāṇāṃ pātālavāsināṃ yaiḥ punaḥ punarindrapurāvamardanādi kiṃ kiṃ na kṛtaṃ taddhṛdayamiti yattebhyastebhyo 'tiduṣkarebhyo
GK16andhvc2u:4719: teṣāṃ ratnānāmā samantāddharaṇe ekarasaṃ tatparaṃ yaddhṛdayaṃ tatkusumabāṇena sukumārataropakaraṇasambhāreṇa priyāṇāṃ bimbādhare niveśitam tadavalokanaparicumbanadarśanamātrakṛtakṛtyatābhimānayogi tenakāmadevena kṛtam /
GK16andhvc2u:4724: gajakumbhasthaleṣvityasya ratimityanena bahumāna ityanena ca sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4730: priyākucakuṅmalasādṛśyena gajakumbhasthaleṣu prītiṃ bibhratāṃ vīrāṇāṃ teṣu bahumatirivetyarthaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:4735: pratīyamāno yo bhaṭānāṃ vīryātiśayastasya yaścamatkāraḥ camatkārakāritvaṃ tamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4748: teṣāṃ hṛdayaṃ yadityādinā pūrvārdhabhāvārthakathanaṃ taditi śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4754: devvāettammi phale kiṃ kīrai ettiaṃ puṇā bhaṇimo /
GK16andhvc2u:4757: sakalaratnasāratulyo bimbādhara iti hi teṣāṃ bahumāno vāstava eva /
GK16andhvc2u:4771: ratnāharaṇe ekarasaṃ yaddhṛdayaṃ tadbimbadhare niveśitamiti vastuto bhinnayorantaḥkaraṇavṛttiviśeṣātmakayoḥ hṛdayayoraikyamatra pratipāditamiti bhede abhedarūpātiśayoktirityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4794: padaprakāśaścāyaṃ dhvaniriti vākyasyārthāntaratātparye 'pi sati na virodhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4797: avaraddhasya vi ṇa hu de pahujāṇaa rosiuṃ sakkam //
GK16andhvc2u:4799: aparāddhasyāpi na khalu te bahujña roṣituṃ śakyam //
GK16andhvc2u:4800: iti chāyā) locanam daivāyatte phale kiṃ kriyatāmetāvatpunarbhaṇāmaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4802: aśokasya phalamāmrādivannāsti, kiṃ kriyatāṃ pallavāstvatīva hṛdyā itīyatābhidhā samāptaiva
GK16andhvc2u:4803: atra phalaśabdasya śaktivaśātsamarthakamasya vastunaḥ pūrvameva pratīyate
GK16andhvc2u:4804: lokottarajigīṣātadupāyapravṛttasyāpi hi phalaṃ sampallakṣaṇaṃ daivāyattaṃ kadācinna bhavedapītyevaṃrūpaṃ sāmānyātmakam /
GK16andhvc2u:4805: nanvasya sarvavākyasyāprastutapraśaṃsā prādhānyena vyaṅgyā tatkathamarthāntaranyāsasya vyaṅgyatā,
GK16andhvc2u:4807: sarvo hi dhvaniprapañcaḥ padaprakāśo vākyaprakāśaśceti yakṣyate /
GK16andhvc2u:4814: atra ityevaṃrūpaṃ sāmānyātmakaṃ asya vastunaḥ samarthakaṃ phalaśabdasya śaktivaśātpūrvameva pratīyata ityanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4815: daivāyatte hi phale kiṃ kriyatāmityatra phalaśabdaḥ prakaraṇavaśāt sasyarūpamarthamabhidhayā vakti, tataścāśokasya phalaṃ nāstīti
GK16andhvc2u:4816: prastutārtho labhyate, punaśca phalaśabdaśśaktimūladhvaninā sampadātmakaprayojanarūpamarthaṃ bodhayati, tataśca sarveṣāṃ sampado
GK16andhvc2u:4819: pūrvameva pratīyate ityasya daivāyatte hi phale ityasya śravaṇakāla eva pratīyata ityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:4822: upāyapravṛttasyāpi sampallakṣaṇaṃ phalamalabdhavataḥ kasyacidrājādeḥ guṇapraśaṃsārūpaḥ prastutārtha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4832: nanvevaṃ sati kathamatra vyavahāra hatyata atra hi vācyaviśeṣeṇa sāparāghasyāpi bahujñasya kopaḥ kartumaśakya iti samarthakaṃ sāmānyamanvitamanyattātparyeṇa prakāśate /
GK16andhvc2u:4836: hṛdaye sthāpito na tu bahiḥ prakaṭato manyuryayā /
GK16andhvc2u:4837: ata evāpradarśitaroṣamukhīmapi māṃ prasādayan he bahujña, aparāddhasyāpi tava na khalu roṣakaraṇaṃ śakyam /
GK16andhvc2u:4839: anantaraṃ tu tadarthaparyālojanādyatsāmānyarūpaṃ samarthakaṃ pratīyate tadeva camatkārakāri
GK16andhvc2u:4840: sā hi khaṇḍitā satī vaidagdhyānunītā taṃ pratyasūyāṃ darśayantītthamāha /
GK16andhvc2u:4841: yaḥ kaścidbahujño dhūrtaḥ sa evaṃ sāparādho 'pi
GK16andhvc2u:4842: svāparādhāvakāśamācchādayatīti mā tvamātmani bahumānaṃ mithyā grahīriti /
GK16andhvc2u:4851: kasyāścidantargataroṣāyā anāviṣkṛtaroṣacihnāyāḥ kṛtāgasā vallabhena prasādyamānāyāḥ taṃ prativacanam--hṛdayetyādi
GK16andhvc2u:4857: he bahujña ! yatastvaṃ māṃ prasādayannasi, ato 'parāddhamapi tvāṃ prati roṣaṃ kartuṃ na śaknomītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4870: nāhamaparādhī nāhamanyāṃ cintayāmi, tvadekāsakte mayi prasīdetyādyamekavacanābhijñeti bahujñapadaprakṛtārthe ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4879: tvamātmani mithyābahujñānaṃ mā grahīḥ, yato bahujñāstu sāparādhā api tattadvacanena svāparādhāvakāśamācchādayantītyarthaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:4886: jāejja vaṇuddese khujja vvia pāavo gaḍiavatto /
GK16andhvc2u:4887: mā māṇusammi loe tāekvaraso dariddo a //
GK16andhvc2u:4890: ita chāyā) atra hi tyāgaikarasasya daridrasya janmānabhinandanaṃ truṭitapatrrakubjapā dapajanmābhinandanaṃ ca sākṣācchabdavācyam /
GK16andhvc2u:4891: tathāvidhādapi pādapāttādṛśasya puṃsa upamānopameyatvapratītipūrvakaṃ śocyatāyāmādhikyaṃ tātparyeṇa prakāśayati /
GK16andhvc2u:4899: jāyeya, vanoddeśa eva vanasyaikānte gahane yatra sphuṭatarabahuvṛkṣasampattyā prekṣate 'pi na kaścit /
GK16andhvc2u:4902: chāyāmapi na karoti tasya kā puṣpaphalavattetyabhiprāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4903: tādṛśo 'pi kadācidāṅgārikasyopayogī bhavedulūkādīnāṃ vā nivāsāyeti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4907: yatra lokyate so 'rthibhistena cārthijano na ca kiñcicchakyate kartuṃ tanmahadvaiśasamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4908: atra bālapriyā khaṃ ye 'tyujvalayanti iti, ityasyānantaraṃ
GK16andhvc2u:4909: 'raktastvaṃnavapallavai'riti iti ca pāṭhaḥ kvacit dṛśyate, sa prāmādikaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4922: ahaṃ kubjaḥ galitapatraḥ pādapaḥ panoddeśe iva jāyeya /
GK16andhvc2u:4925: atra hi madhau malayamārutasya pathikamūrcchākāritvaṃ manmathonmāthadāyitvenaiva /
GK16andhvc2u:4933: viṣavātena hi mūrchito bṛṃhita upacito mohaṃ karoti /
GK16andhvc2u:4934: ekaśca mūrcchitaḥ pathikamadhye 'nyeṣāmapi dhairyacyuti vidadhanmūrcchāṃ karotītityubhayathotprekṣā
GK16andhvc2u:4936: tataḥ kiṃ? na hi hetutā paramārthataḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4937: tathāpi tu hetutā utprekṣyata iti yatkiñcidetat /
GK16andhvc2u:4953: prakṛte niḥśvāsānilasya bhujagasambandhitayāviṣasamparko gamyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4955: tatra samucchrāyārthāprāyeṇā vyācaṣṭe---bṛṃhita iti asyaiva vivaraṇam---upacita iti /
GK16andhvc2u:4964: ubhayathotprekṣeti viṣavātopacitatvaṃ mohāvasthāprāptiśceti ye tayoḥ malayamārutasya pathikamūrcchākaraṇehetutvenotprekṣetyarthaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:4979: candanāsaktabhujagānāṃ niśvāsānilaiḥ mūrcchitaḥ sambaddha iti svarūpakathanamātraparaṃ tadviśeṣaṇamato vācyārthaniṣpattirbodhyā /
GK16andhvc2u:4984: isākalusassa vi tuha muhassa ṇaṃ esa puṇṇimācando /
GK16andhvc2u:4985: ajja sarisattaṇaṃ pāviūṇa aṅge via ṇa māi //
GK16andhvc2u:4987: adya sadṛśatvaṃ prāpyāṅga eva na māti //
GK16andhvc2u:4992: yadi tu prasannasya mukhasya sādṛśyamudvahetsarvadā vā tatkiṃ kuryāttvanmukhaṃ tvetadbhavatīti manorathānāmapyapathamidamityapiśabdasyābhiprāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4993: aṅge svadehe na mātyeva daśa diśaḥ pūrayati yataḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4996: nanu nanuśabdena vitarkotprekṣārūpamācakṣāṇenāsambaddhatā nirākṛteti sambhāvayamāna bālapriyā 'anuraṇanarūpā' saṃlakṣyakramavyaṅgyā /
GK16andhvc2u:4998: śaṅkate 'na ce'tyādi 'evaṃvidhe viṣaye' iti candanāsaktetyādisthala ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5018: atra gamyaṃ hetumāha---daśadiśaḥ pūrayati yata iti /
GK16andhvc2u:5022: aṅgena bhātyevetyanena labdhaṃ svaprabhayā diśaṃ pūraṇamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5025: tava mukhasya sadṛśatvaṃ prāpyeveti mukhasādṛśyaprāptihetukatvenotprekṣyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5033: anubaddhaḥ yathā vā---- trāsākulaḥ paripatan parito niketān puṃbhirna kaiścidapi dhanvibhiranvabandhi
GK16andhvc2u:5037: śleṣadhvaniryathā--- ramyā iti prāptavatīḥ patākāḥ rāgaṃ viviktā iti vardhayantīḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5039: atra vadhūmiḥ saha valabhīrasevanteti vākyārthapratīteranantaraṃ vadhva iva locanam udāharaṇāntaramāha--yathā veti /
GK16andhvc2u:5040: paritaḥ sarvato niketān paripatannākramanna kaiścidapi cāpapāṇibhirasau mṛgo 'nubaddhastathāpi na kvacittasthau trāsacāpalayogātsvābhāvikādeva /
GK16andhvc2u:5042: ikṣaṇaśrīḥ sarvasvabhūtā yasya yato 'to na tasthau /
GK16andhvc2u:5047: kimākārāḥ prasiddhīḥ ramyā ityevamākārāḥ viviktā janasaṅkulatvābhāvādityato heto rāgaṃ sambhogābhilāṣaṃ vardhayantīḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5050: yato hetoḥ viviktā vibhaktaṅgyo laṭabhāḥ yāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5055: bālapriyā anugataḥ, 'na tasthāvi'tyatra vāstavo hetustrāsākula ityanena
GK16andhvc2u:5057: ākarṇapūrṇaiḥ karṇaparyantavyāptaiḥ ākarṇakṛṣṭaiśca netraśaraiḥ netrāṇyeva śarāstaiḥ, ato na tasthāviti /
GK16andhvc2u:5068: tathācoktasthale ivādiśabdābhāve 'pyutprekṣārūpārthasya sahṛdayānāṃ pratīterasambaddhatvāpādānaṃ na yuktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5078: ata eva vadhva iva valabhya ityabhidadhatāpi vṛttikṛtopamādhvaniriti noktam /
GK16andhvc2u:5080: samā iti hi yadi spaṣṭaṃ bhavettadopamāyā eva spaṣṭatvācchleṣastadākṣiptaḥ syāt /
GK16andhvc2u:5082: na ca tena vinābhidāyā aparipuṣṭatā kācit /
GK16andhvc2u:5083: ata eva samāptāyāmevābhidhāyāṃ sahṛdayaireva sa dvitīyo 'rtho
GK16andhvc2u:5087: 'pīnaścaitro divā nāti' ityatrābhidhaivāparyavasiteti saiva svārthanirvāhāyārthāntaraṃ śabdāntaraṃ vākarṣatītyanumānasya
GK16andhvc2u:5105: yūnāṃ savadhūkānāṃ satāṃ valabhīsevanasyārthasya prakṛtatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5114: divābhojanamakurvataḥ kutaḥ pīnatvamityākāṅkṣāsattvena śāntākāṅkṣasya bodhasyājananāditi bhāvaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:5127: madanaviśeṣaṇībhūto yo 'ṅkuritādiśabdaḥ sañjāteṣatprādurbhāvādiḥ tadarthaḥ taṭgataṃ tadāśritam
GK16andhvc2u:5141: yathāsaṅkhyadhvaniryathā--- aṅkuritaḥ pallavitaḥ korakitaḥ puṣpitaśca sahakāraḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5142: aṅkuritaḥ pallavitaḥ korakitaḥ puṣpitaśca hṛdi madanaḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:5149: yathā ca dīpakadhvaniḥ-- mā bhavantamanalaḥ pavano vā vāraṇo madavalaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:5151: vajramindrakaraviprasṛtaṃ vā svasti te 'stu latayā saha vṛkṣa //
GK16andhvc2u:5156: priyatamena sākamudyāne viharantī kācinnāyikā bhramaramevamāheti bhṛṅgasyābhidhāyāṃ bālapriyā 'aṅkurite' iti saptamyantapāṭho 'pi pūrvārdhe dṛśyate /
GK16andhvc2u:5167: atra "yaśca nimbaṃ paraśune"tyādāviva mā bhavantamanala ityatra
GK16andhvc2u:5168: dhākṣīdityasya, pavano vetyādau bhāṅkṣīrityasya, paraśurvetyādau bhaitsīdityasya cādhyāhāreṇa vācyārthaniṣpattirbodhyā /
GK16andhvc2u:5184: na cāmantraṇādaprastutatvāvagatiḥ, pratyutāmāntraṇaṃ tasyā maugdhyavijṛmbhitamiti abhidhayā tāvannāprastutapraśaṃsā samāpyā /
GK16andhvc2u:5186: yatsaubhāgyābhimānapūrṇā sukumāraparimalamālatīkusumasadṛśī kulavadhūrnirvyājapremaparatayā kṛtakavaidagdhyalabdhaprasiddhyatiśayāni śambhalīkaṇṭakavyāptāni dūrāmodaketakīvanasthānīyāni veśyākulānītaścetaśca
GK16andhvc2u:5201: bhṛṅgavṛttāntasya yadyaprastutatvaṃ bhavetadā priyatamopālambharūpārtha eva vākyasya viśrāntyā tasyābhidhayā samāpyatvaṃ bhavet, prakṛte bhṛṅgavṛttāntasyāpi prastutatvasambhavānmukhyatayā vivakṣitaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5224: yaḥ gaurāṅgīkucakumbha iva bhūriḥ subhagaścābhogo yasya tasmin /
GK16andhvc2u:5225: sudhādhāmani candre kālāgaruṇā yā patrabhaṅgaracanā racitaḥ patrabhaṅga iti yāvat, tadrūpeṇa yo vāsaḥ, yadvā---racanāyā āvāsaḥ āspadatvaṃ tena
GK16andhvc2u:5227: he natāṅgi sundari ! locanam vicchedānaladīpitotkavanitācetodhivāsodbhavaṃ santāpaṃ vininīṣureṣa vitatairaṅgairnatāṅgi smaraḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:5230: api tu gaurāṅgīstanābhogasthānīye candramasi kālāgurupatrrabhaṅgavicchittyāspadatvena yaḥ sāratāmutkṛṣṭatāmācaratīti tanna jānīmaḥ kimetadvastviti sasandeho 'pi dhvanyate /
GK16andhvc2u:5231: pūrvamanaṅgīkṛtapraṇayāmanutaptāṃ virahotkaṇṭhitāṃ vallabhāgamanapratīkṣāparatvena kṛtaprasādhanādividhitayā vāsakasajjībhūtāṃ pūrṇacandrodayāvasare dūtīmukhānītaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:5232: priyatamastvadīyakucakalaśanyastakālāgurupatrrabhaṅgaracanā manmathoddīpanakāriṇīti cāṭukaṃ kurvāṇaścandravartinī ceyaṃ kuvalayadalaśyāmalakāntirevameva karotīti prativastūpamādhvanirapi sudhādhāmanīti candraparyāyatayopāttamapi padaṃ santāpaṃ vininīṣurityatra hetutāmapi bālapriyā eṣa iti /
GK16andhvc2u:5234: vicchedaḥ priyatamaviraha evānalo 'griḥ, tena dīpitāni yāni
GK16andhvc2u:5235: utkānāmutkaṇṭhitānāṃ vanitānāṃ cetāṃsi tadadhivāsena udbhavo yasya tam /
GK16andhvc2u:5242: nāyamaṅkaḥ, kintu tathāvidho manmatha ityapahnava ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5258: sāraḥ utkṛṣṭa ivācarati sāro bhavati iti vā vigrahaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5278: tvadīyakucakalaśanyastakālāgarupatrabhaṅgaracanāmanmathoddīpanakāriṇo candravartinīyaṃ kuvalayadalaśyāmalā kāntiścaivameva karotīti vaktṛnāyakacāṭuvākyārthasya pratītyā prativastūpamāyā dhvanirityarthaḥ hetutāmiti /
GK16andhvc2u:5280: śobhābhiḥ saha uddīpayati iti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5282: tvadīyakucaśobhā mṛgāṅkaśobhā ca saha madanamuddīpayata iti sahoktidhvanirapi /
GK16andhvc2u:5289: digdantiromacalanaṃ dharaṇīṃ dhunoti khātsampatannapi latāṃ calayenna bhṛṅgaḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:5290: eṣāṃ tu bhedānāṃ saṃsṛṣṭitva saṅkaratvaṃ ca yathāyogaṃ cintyam /
GK16andhvc2u:5291: atiśayoktidhvaniryathā mamaiva--- kelīkandalitasya vibhramamadhordhuryaṃ vapuste dṛśau bhaṅgībhaṅgarakāmakārbhukamidaṃ bhrūnarmakarmakramaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5292: āpāte 'pi vikārakāraṇamaho vaktrāmbujanmāsavaḥ satyaṃ sundari vedhasastrijagatīsārastvamekākṛtiḥ
GK16andhvc2u:5293: atra hi madhu māsamadanāsavānāṃ trailokye subhagatānyonyaṃ paripoṣakatvena
GK16andhvc2u:5304: he sundari ! te tava dṛśau kelīvilāsijanasya krīḍā tasyāḥ kandalaṃ navāṅkuraḥ riṣadāvirbhāva iti yāvat /
GK16andhvc2u:5306: vibhramaḥ strīṇāṃ śṛhgāraceṣṭā tatkārī vibhramaḥ śobhā, tacchālī vā yo
GK16andhvc2u:5307: madhurvasantaḥ tasya dhuraṃ kāmoddīpanādibhāraṃ vahatīti dhuryam /
GK16andhvc2u:5309: tvadīyaṃ netradvitayamacirāvirbhūtasya vasantasya kāmoddīpanādikāryakāri śarīraṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:5312: bhaṅkī racanāviśeṣaḥ, tayā hetunā bhaṅguraṃ vakraṃ, yadvā---bhaṅgīyuktaṃ
GK16andhvc2u:5313: vakraṃ ca yat kāmasya kārbhukaṃ kramikakarmaviśiṣṭaṃ dhanuḥ tadbhavati /
GK16andhvc2u:5314: yadvā---idamiti bhinnaṃ padaṃ karmukaviśeṣaṇaṃ, kramikakarmaviśiṣṭamiti tadarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5315: tathā te vaktrāmbujanmani mukhapajhe ya āsavaḥ madyaviśeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5320: ataḥ tvamekā vedhasaḥ kṛtiḥ sṛṣṭiḥ trijagatīsāraḥ trailokyasārabhūtā bhavati /
GK16andhvc2u:5329: te 'laṅkārāḥ parāṃ chāyāṃ yānti dhvanyaṅgatāṃ gataḥ // DhvK_2.28 //
GK16andhvc2u:5331: te 'laṅkārāḥ parāṃ chāyāṃ yānti dhvanyaṅgatāṃ gataḥ // 28 //
GK16andhvc2u:5332: dhvanyaṅgatā cobhābhyāṃ prakārābhyāṃ vyañjakatvena vyaṅgyatvena ca /
GK16andhvc2u:5334: vyaṅgyatve 'pyalaṅkārāṇāṃ pradhānyavivakṣāyāmeva locanam tvayi lokottareṇa vapuṣā sambhūya sthitā ityatiśayoktirdhvanyate /
GK16andhvc2u:5342: nanuktāstāvaccirantanairalaṅkārāsteṣāṃ tu bhavatā yadi vyaṅgyatvaṃ pradarśitaṃ kimiyatetyāśaṅkyāha--evamityādi
GK16andhvc2u:5343: yeṣāmalaṅkārāṇāṃ vācyatvena śarīrīkaraṇaṃ śarīrabhūtātprastutādarthāntarabhūtatayā aśarīrāṇāṃ kaṭakādisthānīyānāṃ śarīratāpādanaṃ vyavasthitaṃ bālapriyā te madhumadanāsavāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5346: madanadhanuṣo bhrūrūpeṇa sthityā madanasya sthitiḥ sidhyatīti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc2u:5353: dṛgdvayasya madhośca sāmyavivakṣayā dṛśau vibhramamadhordhuryaṃ vapurityuktyā "nyūnasyāpi viśiṣṭene"tyādinā bhāmahādilakṣitā tulyayogitetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5359: niyataḥ niyamitaḥ viṣayaḥ alaṅkāraviśeṣarūpāśrayo yasya tatkṛtamityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:5380: locanam yadi vā vācyatve sati yeṣāṃ śarīratāpādanamapi na vyavasthitaṃ durghaṭamiti yāvat
GK16andhvc2u:5381: te 'laṅkārā dhvanervyāpārasya kāvyasya vāṅgatāṃ vyaṅgyarūpatayā gatāḥ santaḥ parāṃ durlabhāṃ chāyāṃ kāntimātmarūpatāṃ yānti /
GK16andhvc2u:5382: etaduktaṃ bhavati---sukavirvidagdhapurandhīvadbhūṣaṇaṃ yadyapi śliṣṭaṃ yojayati, tathāpi śarīratāpattirevāsya kaṣṭasampādyā kuṅkumapītikāyā iva /
GK16andhvc2u:5384: evambhūtā ceyaṃ vyaṅgyatā yā apradhānabhūtāpi vācyamātrālaṅkārebhya utkarṣamalaṅkārāṇāṃ vitarati
GK16andhvc2u:5441: tadaprādhānye tu vācyālaṅkāra eva pradhānamiti guṇībhūtavyaṅgyateti bhāvaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:5442: nanvalaṅkāro vastunā vyajyate alaṅkārāntareṇa ca vyajyata ityatrodāharaṇāni kimiti na darśitānītyāśaṅkyāha---vastviti
GK16andhvc2u:5455: ataḥ tatparatvena bhāvyaṃ, tathāca dhvanyaṅgatvameveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5468: vā prakāśane cārutvotkarṣanibandhane sati prādhānye 'rthaśaktudbhavānuraṇarūpavyaṅgyo dhvaniravagantavyaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:5469: evaṃ dhvaneḥ prabhedān pratipādya tadābhāsavivekaṃ kartumucyate--
GK16andhvc2u:5471: vācyasyāṅgatayā vāpi nāsyāsau gocaro dhvaneḥ // DhvK_2.31 //
GK16andhvc2u:5475: tatra ya eva sphuṭaḥ śabdaśaktyārthaśaktyā vā prakāśate sa eva dhvanermārgo netaraḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5479: kamalāarā ṇaṃ maliā haṃsā uḍḍāviā ṇa a piucchā /
GK16andhvc2u:5480: locanam vyañjakasya ca pratyekaṃ vastvalaṅkārarūpatayā dviprakāratvāccaturvidho 'yamathaśaktyudbhava iti tātparyam //29//
GK16andhvc2u:5489: te ca pratyekaṃ vyaṅgyavyañjakayoruktabhedanayena caturdheti dvādaśavidho
GK16andhvc2u:5492: te ca padavākyaprakāśatvena pratyekaṃ dvividhā vakṣyante /
GK16andhvc2u:5505: atra padavākyaprakāśatvena bhedasyoktatvādanena varṇasaṅghaṭanāprabandhaprakāśayatvena yadbhedatrayaṃ tadeva vivakṣitaṃ,
GK16andhvc2u:5512: keṇa vi gāmataḍāe abbhaṃ uttāṇaaṃ phaliham //
GK16andhvc2u:5513: atra hi pratiyamānasya mugdhavadhvā jaladharapratibimbadarśanasya vācyāṅgatvameva /
GK16andhvc2u:5520: evaṃvidho hi viṣayaḥ prāyeṇa guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasyodāharaṇatvena nirdakṣyate
GK16andhvc2u:5521: locanam asyetyātmabhūtasya dhvanerasau kāvyaviśeṣo na gocaraḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5522: kamalākarā na malitā haṃsā uḍḍāyitā na ca sahasā /
GK16andhvc2u:5526: anye tu pi ucchā pitṛṣvasaḥ itthamāmantryate /
GK16andhvc2u:5529: vācyenaiva hi vismayavibhāvarūpeṇa mugdhimātiśayaḥ pratīyata iti vācyādeva cārutvasampat /
GK16andhvc2u:5541: kasyāścinmugdhāyāstaṭāke pratibimbitamabhraṃ dṛṣṭvā vismitāyāḥ sakhījanaṃ pitṛṣvasāraṃ vā prati kamaletyādivacanam /
GK16andhvc2u:5542: kenāpi grāmataṭāke abhraṃ medhamaṇḍalam uttānitamuttānaṃ kṛtaṃ sat anyathā yathopari tathā jalāntardarśanaṃ na bhavet kṣiptaṃ parantu /
GK16andhvc2u:5543: kamalākarāḥ na malināḥ sañjātamalāḥ malinā iti vā chāyā /
GK16andhvc2u:5546: sahasetyasya sthāne pitṛṣvasa iti chāyāṃ kecit paṭhantītyāha---anya ityādi
GK16andhvc2u:5556: yatra tu prakaraṇādipratipattyā nirdhārataviśeṣo vācyo 'rthaḥ punaḥ pratīyamānāṅgatvenaivāvabhāsate so 'syaivānuraṇanarūpavyaṅgyasya
GK16andhvc2u:5559: ucciṇasu paḍia kusumaṃ mā dhuṇa sehāliaṃ haliasuhṇe /
GK16andhvc2u:5560: aha de visamavirāvo samureṇa suo valaasaddo //
GK16andhvc2u:5562: tathā hi gṛhakarmavyāpṛtāyā ityanyaparāyā api, vādhvā iti sātiśayalajjāpāratantryabaddhāyā api, aṅgānītyekamapi na tādṛgaṅgaṃ
GK16andhvc2u:5563: yadgāmbhīryāvahitthavaśena saṃvarītuṃ pāritam, sadintītyāstāṃ gṛhakarmasampādanaṃ svātmānamapi dhartuṃ na prabhavantīti /
GK16andhvc2u:5568: punarvācyaḥ punarapi svaśabdenokto 'ta eva svātmāvagateḥ sampannapūrvatvādena tāvanmātraparyavasāyī na bhavati bālapriyā datteti /
GK16andhvc2u:5569: dattasaṅketo yaścauryakāmuko jāraḥ tasya ratasamucitasthāne vetasalatāgahane prāptiḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5580: gṛhakarmayoge sphuṭaṃ tathā na lakṣyamāṇānīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5595: vākyajanyabodhaṃ pratyeva prakaraṇādijñānasya hetutvāt upalakṣaṇaṃ cedamanumānādajanyaniścayasya
GK16andhvc2u:5600: ata atra hyavinayapatinā saha ramamāṇā sakhī bahiḥśrutavalayakalakalayā locanam tathāvidhaśca pratīyamānasyāṅgatāmetīti so 'sya dhvanerviṣaya ityanena vyaṅgyatātparyanibandhanaṃ sphuṭaṃ vadatā vyaṅgyaguṇībhāve
GK16andhvc2u:5602: uccinu patitaṃ kusumaṃ mā dhunīhi śephālikāṃ hālakasnuṣe /
GK16andhvc2u:5603: eṣa te viṣamavipākaḥ śvaśureṇa śruto valayaśabdaḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:5605: yataḥ śvaśuraḥ śophālikālatikāṃ prayatnai rakṣaṃstasyā ākarṣaṇadhūnanādinā kupyati /
GK16andhvc2u:5608: atra ca 'kassa vā ṇa hoi roso' ityetadanusāreṇa vyākhyā kartavyā /
GK16andhvc2u:5611: svatassiddhatayā avacanīya eva so 'rthaḥ syāditi yāvat /
GK16andhvc2u:5612: nanvevaṃ vyaṅgyasyopaskāratā pratyutoktā bālapriyā evetyasya vivaraṇam---svāmetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:5626: śvaśureṇa śrutaḥ san viṣamavipākaḥ viṣamo 'niṣṭajanako vipākaḥ pariṇāmo yasya saḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5632: atra yatkiñcidvyaṅgyasya vācyāṅgatve 'pi vyaṅgyāntaramādāya dhvanitvamiti darśayati vṛttau--'atre'tyādinā
GK16andhvc2u:5645: bodhayitavyanāyikāyāḥ sakhī māṃ pratibodhayatīti, sahṛdayānāṃ tu ramamāṇanāyikāyai sakhī pratibodhayatīti ca jñānaṃ jñāyamānaṃ tadyvaṅgyaṃ vā vācyārthalābhaṃ prati sahakārīti yāvat uktaṃ vyavasthāpayati----anyathetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:5655: punarvācya iti grantho yathāvyākhyātastathā sakhyā pratibodhyate /
GK16andhvc2u:5659: evaṃ vivakṣitavācyasya dhvanestadābhāsaviveke prastute satyavivakṣitavācyasyāpi taṃ kartumāha---
GK16andhvc2u:5660: avyutpatter aśakter vā nibandho yaḥ skhalad-gateḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5661: śabdasya sa ca na jñeyaḥ sūribhir viṣayo dhvaneḥ // DhvK_2.32 //
GK16andhvc2u:5663: śabdasya sa ca na jñeyaḥ sūribhirviṣayo dhvaneḥ // 32 //
GK16andhvc2u:5676: yathā---- preṅkhatpremaprabandhapracuraparicaye prauḍhasīmantinīnāṃ cittākāśāvakāśe viharati satataṃ yaḥ sa saubhāgyabhūmiḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5677: atrānuprāsarasikatayā preṅkhaditi lākṣaṇikaḥ, cittākāśa iti gauṇaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:5691: prastute ityasya ārabdhe prakṛte iti vā vyākhyāne sati tatpadamasaṅgataṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5698: premṇaḥ prabandhaḥ prakarṣeṇa bandhaḥ sthirīkaraṇaṃ tena saha pracuraḥ paricayo yasya tasmin
GK16andhvc2u:5704: skhaladgaterupacaritasya śabdasyāvyutpatteraśaktervā nibandho yaḥ sa ca na dhvanerviṣayaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:5707: yad vyaṅgyasyāṅgi-bhūtasya tat pūrṇaṃ dhvani-lakṣaṇam // DhvK_2.33 //
GK16andhvc2u:5715: atraitat kāmapi kāntiṃ na puṣyata, ṛte vṛttapūraṇāt /
GK16andhvc2u:5717: prathamoddyote yaḥ prasiddhyanurodhapravartitavyavahārāḥ kavaya ityatra 'vadati bisinīpatrraśayanam' ityādi bhākta uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5718: sa na kevalaṃ dhvanerna viṣayo yāvadayamanyo 'pīti caśabdasyārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5723: dhvanilakṣaṇaṃ dhvaneḥ svarūpaṃ pūrṇam, avabhāsanaṃ vā jñānaṃ
GK16andhvc2u:5726: viṣamaḥ viṣamasaṃkhyākaḥ kāṇḍaśśaro yasya tasya kāmadevasya, yaḥ kuḍumbakasañjayaḥ tasya pravaramukhya he candretyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5728: kuraṅgeti pāṭhe ca latākuraṅgeṇa mṛgeṇa vidhūrṇitaṃ bhājanaṃ madhyabhāgo yasya tasminnityātmaviśeṣaṇam
GK16andhvc2u:5736: sa ceti cakāraḥ prathamodyotoktasamuccāyaka ityāha--prathamadyoto ityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:5742: avabhāsanapadena avabhāsamānaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ lakṣyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5755: vṛttāvevakāreṇa tato 'nyasya cābhāsarūpatvameveti sūcayatā tadābhāsavivekahetubhāvoyaḥ prakrantaḥ sa eva nirvāhita iti śivam //
GK16andhvc2u:5758: iti śrīmahāmāheśvarācāryavaryābhinavaguptonmīlite sahṛdayāloka locane dhvanisaṅkete dvitīya uddyotaḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:5765: yayā māyārūpayā parameśvaryā prājyaṃ prabhūtam idaṃ jagadati prathamāntatayā /
GK16andhvc2u:5767: prollāsaḥ pratītistanmātram sat na tu vastusaditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5771: idaṃ jagatpaśyantīṃ tāmabhinavagupto 'haṃ vande iti sambandhaḥ /
